1a1(gso rig): sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba i gu dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ro//
1b1(gso rig): bkru sman dang skyugs sman la sogs
1b2(gso rig): banang sbyang ba'i sman sde sna tshogs 'dus par da
2a1(gso rig): pa'i le'u bco lnga pa bshad par bya'o// skyugs sman gyi sde la/ sman po son cha dang / shing mngar dang / ka laM ba dang /
2a2(gso rig): nim+ba dang / bim+ba dang / bai sha la dang / ga gon ro kha ba'i thor to dang / 'bras bu dang / in+d+ra ya ba dug mo nyung dang / murba dang
2a3(gso rig): de ba ta li dang / lto'i srin bu gsod pa'i bi taM ka dang / bi du la dang / tsai traka kru trug tres dang / pa te la'i sa bon dang /
2b1(gso rig): rany+dza dang / bi bi ling dang / lce myang tshwa dang / shu dag dang / sug smel dang / yungs kar dang / 'di rnams ni skyugs sman du btang ba'i sman gyi sde'i rnam grangasu gtog so// de la bkru sman
2b2(gso rig): du gtong ba'i sman ni/ tri ba ti dang / shing nye rong / dan+ti dang / 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang // ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / bi sha la'i rtsa ba dang / shing gi khu ba ha ga shi ra dang / stog
2b3(gso rig): shang gi ni dang / ni li dang / ro d+ha seng phom dang / dong ka dang / ki bi l+ya ka dang / su ba ra na shi ra dang / byar nu dang / be gcin dang / 'di rnams ni bkru sman du gtog so// bkru sman mas btang
2b4(gso rig): sman gyi sna grangs ni/ bo son cha dang / dug mo nyung / ru rta dang / de ba ta l-i dang / shing mngar dang / shu dag dang / rtsa ba'i sman sna bcu la/ sa la bar+Ni dang / briSh+Ta paN+Di dang / kaN+Tha ka ra dang / br-i ha tI/
3a1(gso rig): dpra gze ma thog drung rtsa thon dang / 'di rnams ni sman gyi rtsa ba phra mo lnga zhes bya'o// bil ba'i rtsa ba dang / ag+ni man+ta dang / s+yo na ka dang / taM pa la dang / pa ta li dang / 'di lnga'i rtsa ba ni rtsu ba chen po lnga zhes bya
3a2(gso rig): ste/ rtsa ba che phra gnyis gcig tu bsdus pa ni rtsa ba bcu zhes bya ba dang / da ba da rung thab shing dang / ra sna dang / ya ba ni la la pud dang / ta puSh+pa sha ti dang / kri ta be d+ha na dang / rgya sran nag po dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tse myed mr-i
3a3(gso rig): 'amaHrgya ma tshwa shing nye ba rong 'di rnams ni bkru sman mas btang ba'i sde tshan du gtog so// mgul pa yan chad mgo'i nad dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / lkog nad la sogs pa ci nu yang rung ste/ sman sna nas btang zhing nad sbyangs
3a4(gso rig): ba'i sman sde la/ bil la dang / a ba margang ngo / tsha ba rnam pa gsum po na laM sham dang / li dong ra dang / pi pi ling dang / skyer ba'i rtsa ba dang / su ra la'i sa bon dang / shi ri sha'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rtsa ba dang pri
3a5(gso rig): hA ti'i lo me dang me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang sna lnga dang / shi klu'i lo ma dang / mu tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu rtse bAr bcas pa lnga dang / sring ljang dang / shing ma du ka'i me tog dang / rgyu mchu da /
3a6(gso rig): mig sman skyer khaN+Da dang / pha bong gi dreg pa dang / sug sbrel dang / ldum bu sris ci ka dang / sman sde 'di rnams ni mgul pa yan ched klad pa'i nad thams cad sel cing sgreng ba'i sman du gtogs// de la rlung nad sel cing zhi bar
3b1(gso rig): byeng ba'i sman gyi rnam grangs ni/ dwe ba dU ru thapA shing drung / rgyu spos dang / ru N+Da dang / sman gyi rtsa ba bcu rnams dang / ba zla dang / a ti pa la dang / smanu bi ra ta ra'i sprer+ya gtogs pa la sogs pa dang / smyan bi dA ra'i sbyar
3b2(gso rig): sbyor gtogs pa rnams ni rlung rlung sel to// mkhris pa'i nad tsha ba rnams sel ba'i sman gyi s+t+ri ni/ r+dz+dza duR+Sha dang / pUr+ya rU ba dang / nim+ba dang / sman pa sha ka'i lo ma dang / rtsa ba'i bar du sna lnga dang / ut+ma gup+ta kha~M sbal phre'u dang /
3b3(gso rig): rim sa'i rtsu ba dang / nye'u shi la dang / shi ta pa ki dang / gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / shing n+ya gri d+ha la sogs pa dang / shing shug pa dang / sman thi ra rnam gnyis dang / pad+ma'i ze ba dang / thil tres la sogs pa 'di rnams ni
3b4(gso rig): mkhris pa'i nang spel to// bad kan gyi nang rgyus pa la ni dong / la sogs pa dang / shing arka la sogs pa'i lo ma me tig sna lngar brtsis b+ha dang / shing mus+sa ka la sogs pa rtsa ba dang 'bras bucu bcas pa sna wAr
3b5(gso rig): bcas pa dang / shIng oM sar+b+ba la stsogs pa'i rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i bar sna lnga dang / b+he ru rAg+sa pa la sogs pa dang / glu spring chen po la sogs bya dang / in+d+ra ya dug mo nyung la sogs pa sman ste 'di rnams ni bed
3b6(gso rig): kan sel bar byed do// sman dzi ban+d+ha'i sngar gtogs pa la/ dzi ban+ti dang / rame nye ba rnam gnyis dang / me da dang / ma hA ma de rnam gnyis dang / mon sran sde'u mung+ga dang / min sran ma sha gnyis kyi lo ma dang / ldum bu
4a1(gso rig): ri shrA b+ha ga bzangs rtsi ba dang / dzI bA ku dang / shing mngar dang / 'dra bcu'i ming ni 'argyu byad ces bya'o// yang khar zhim pa la lus kyi sha mchug chen por byed cing rlung nAd dang mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i
4a2(gso rig): sman sde'i rnam grangs la/ bi der drung / dong k+Sha dang / 'bri l+lI ka li dang / bun+d+ha rna ba drung / de ba dang / sa hang po dang / bro ba pan+d+ha dang / kha sral dang / dzi ba ti tsa phra mo sna bcu dang / shing shi ri ba thal tres kyi rtsa ba dang / lcug
4a3(gso rig): mi dang / thos pa ti dang / de ltar 'di rnams kyi spyir bi da ri'i grangs su gtogs te snying la phan/ sha mchog rta/ rlung dang mkhros pa'i nang sel/ lus skem pa sha skye/ sman dang sgra tshigs dang / nya bzhin pa dang / dbugs
4a4(gso rig): bdebA dang / lud pa gru ba dang / 'di rnams sel cing phan pa'i grangs su gtogs// ying lus chab drung // khrag pa mkhris pa zlas te skom dang che zhing rnams kyis btub bo 'di rnams stsol ba'i sman no/ shing sha ro rab thal rjes dang /
4a5(gso rig): u shi ra dang / ka ma ri tat+pa la/ shing ma du kA zhes bya ba dang / tsan den dkar po dang / dmar po sna gnyis dang / shing mngar dang / ba ru sha ka dang / 'di rnams tsha ba'i nad dang mkhris pa'i nad dang // khrag rgyas pa dang rnos ba mas kyis
4a6(gso rig): btab pa la phan no// shing shug pa dang / la~M kha ra tsho shing phun+d+ha gnyis dang / r-id+b+ha dang / b+hid+d+hi da / ri dgas kan ta'i rwa shing gi zhes bya ba dang / sle tres dang / dzi ba na sna bcu dang 'di rnams ni nu zho skya/ rlung nad dang / mkhris
4b1(gso rig): ba'i nAd sel/ lus nyams chung zhing khyong ba rmya ba lta bu la/ khong NA sha cher skye/ tsho bar byed/ bud med la nyal bod par 'gyu ro// yang sman pa ru sha ka dang / 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / rgun 'brum dang /
4b2(gso rig): shing ni hi ri kAd pa la'i shun pa dang / shing ka tau'i 'bras bu dang / shring tog ro dza dan dang / bal po se'u 'bras bu dang / rmya sne'u dang 'di rnams skem dang tsha ba drang chu sri ba dang rlung nad sal to// yang lig pu pa~M grwa dang / gan+d+ho pre yi gu
4b3(gso rig): dang / spyang spros dang / me tog pad+ma dang / me tog ut+pa la dang / sgyer khan+d+ha dang / sug sbal dang / shing dang ra dang / nA gA gai sar dang / 'di rnams ni dug nAd sel/ lus tshu bi dang / mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nang sel to// ba to la dang /
4b4(gso rig): ka tu kA ro hi nI pu N+ye shel dang / tsin+da dan+t+ra dkar po dang / shing mngar dang / sle tris dang / shing pa tha dang / 'di rnams nI/ bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / mdze dang / rims dang / dgu dang / rtag tu skyug bro ba dang /
4b5(gso rig): zas ye gar mi 'ong ba dang / mIg ser gyi nad dang / 'di rnams sel to// yang gu ru rtse sle tres dang / shug pA dang / shing nrim+ba dang / 'u su'i 'bras bu dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / 'di rnams ni khris pa dung
4b6(gso rig): bad kan rgyas pa dang / rims kyis btab pa dang / skyug bro ba dang / lus tsha ba dang / skem dad che ba dang / nad 'di rnams kyang pha la/ zas 'ju pho ba'i drong skye/ dong ga dang / in+d+ra ya ba dug mai yungs dang / ba li'i me tog
5a1(gso rig): dang / ka kA tik+Sh+Na dang / nim+ba dang / sle tres dang / rtswa dur+tha dang / shing dang ra dang / pa tha dang / tsi ra tik+ta zhes bya ba ci skrigs dang / shel rgya ga ni la puSh+pa dang ba na zhes kyang bya ba dang / pa to la dang / ka na dza rnam gnyis
5a2(gso rig): dang d+hasap+ta tshA zhes bya ba dang / shing gi 'dab ma rnam bdun dang / tsi tra ka/ kru trug tres dang / su sha bi dang / po son cha dang / shing ba na dang / gon ta dang / 'di rnams 'dra ste dong ka la sogs pa skyugs pa gcod/ ma dze dang / dug dang /
5a3(gso rig): rims dang / bdA kaun rgyas pa dang / g.yan pa dang na can sI ng+ga dang / rmo po 'byeng ngo // ya dze lta rmA da zhengam ma bdun pa dang / shre shini sha dang / gro ba dang / shrI bab pa dang / na ka dang / shing seng ldeng bar
5a4(gso rig): ka ta ra dang / b+han+thi dang / shing sha pa dang / ma sha shrI ga dang / tri hi ma dang / ta l-i dang / rmya skyegs kyi shing dang / a ka ru dang / rgya sne'u dang / shing sA la dang / shing d+ha ba dang / ka bu ka dang / ka lam ka zhes bya pa dang / in+d+ra ya
5a5(gso rig): bya dug mo nyung dang / tsha ga kaSh+Ta dang / a shwa kaR+ShA tha rams dang / de ltar a sa na la sogs pa sman 'di rnams ni/ sha bak+tha dang / mi dze dang / ban kan gyi nad dang / khong na sprin bu yod pa sal/ nad skyu rba ba dang / gcin sti ba dang
5a6(gso rig): tsho ches pa'i tshil nad 'di rnams sel to// shing pa ra'i ma tog dkar po dang / shing shi rgya ka'i me tog sngon po la na pe dang / nyi'u shing pa dang / tsi tra ka dang / mo ra ta dang / shing bil+la dang / a za shA gau dang / bri ha tI rnam gnyis
5b1(gso rig): kA rany+dza rnam gnyis/ dzaM la rnam gnyis la/ ag ni man tha sna gnyis dang / shinga? shi kru'i 'dab ma/ bo'u ba la pa dang / b+hU ku sha dang / ru rta 'di rnams ni shing bA ra na la sogs pa zhes bya ste/ bad kan gyi nad dang / tsho ches te tshil
5b2(gso rig): skyes pa'i nang dang / zas mi 'ju ste drod chung ba las/ rlung nad char skyes pa sel klad ba na ba la phan/ skran dang / an+ta bit+ta b+hi khong 'bras 'di rnams sel to// yang sman bri sha ka dang / spungs ma dang / shing kun dang /
5b3(gso rig): nog chur rnam gnyis te/ nag tshur dang / nag tshur bya bal ma dang / rgya ma tshwa drang / shi la dza tu dang / 'di rnams ni chu sri ba dang / rde'u yod pa dang / khong na skan yod pa dang / lus kyi tshil ches pa dang / bad kan sel
5b4(gso rig): to/ sman pa lan+ta ra dang / a ran+ne dang / sug dang / bri shi dang / a sham be ta sru sru dang / ko kan+ta gza ma dang / ka ta dang / sa ha ra tsa dang / ba na ni la phus pa dang / r+ts+tsa durba dang / brik+Sha da ni dang / na la kA sha rnam
5b5(gso rig): gnyis dang / kun+da dang / gun+d+ha dang / ba lu ka dang / mo ra ta dang / ka ru ga t+ya dang / shing ram pa dang / pa rta dang / sman sna 'di rnams ni/ rlung nad du gyur pa sel/ chu se na sde'u yod pa dang / gcin sr-i ste
5b6(gso rig): 'ong du mi rung ba dang / 'di rnams sal to// yang sman sha ba ra ka ro seng phrom dang / pat+ti ka ro d+hA dang / rgya skyegs skyi shing dang / dzim+bi ni dang / thang shing paR+Ya dang / shing ka tI la'i shun pa dang / kut+si ta ma pa
6a1(gso rig): dang / ldum bu chu skyes kyi me trog dang / me tog gi rtsa ba dang / shing a shwa ka dang / shing bi ta shra ka dang / e la ba lu ka dang / sa rI phel ba dang / mo che rnams te/ de ltar sman ro d+ha la sogs pa 'di dag
6a2(gso rig): ni tshil che ba dang / bad kin gyi nod sel bA byed pa dang / bud med kyi mngal nA ba la phan/ 'khru bu gcod/ sha mdog bzang bar 'gyur ro// dug nad sel to// shing ar ka'i rtsa ba dang / shing a lan dang / na ya dan+ti dang
6a3(gso rig): bil shal+la dang / b+han+thi dang / ra sna dang / bris tsaM ka li dang / sri kI rgya dang / shing a pa mar+g+ha'i me tog dang / pi ta twe la zhes bya ba ka ka da ni dang / u da kar+ya dang / mahA she da dang / shing ing+ku dang / de ltar ar+tha'i sder
6a4(gso rig): gtogs pa sman 'di rnams ni byad kan rgyas pa dang / tshil ches pa dang / dug nad rnams sel to// lho na srinA bu yod pa dang / mdze nad zhi bar byed/ lhag par ni rma rad par 'byang ste 'tshe'o// bye'u rug pa rnam
6a5(gso rig): gnyis te nag po dang / ser po dang / ku tha rA ga zimA thig la dang / ka la mA la dang / srin bu sel ba'i sman byi tang ga dang / khA ra pat+tA dang / bri sha kAR+ShI dang / kat+sa la zhes byA gA rau hi ni dang / kr-I saM man+da ka dang /
6a6(gso rig): sha ba ka dang / shing ka pi ta'i lo ma dang / b+ha ra gyi ka pra'i rtsa ba dang / rak+Sha many+dzi ri dang / ka ka ma tsi mon sne'u dang / ku la ha ra dang / bi sha mus+thi dang / bu tri na dang / pu ta ka shiM baM po dang / sman 'di rnams ni byi'u
6b1(gso rig): rug pa la sogs pa'i grangasu gtogs te/ bad kan rgyas pa dang / tshil che ba dang / lto na srin bu yod pa dang / 'di rnams sel/ cham pa na ba dang / zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / dbugs mI bde ba dang / lung pa lu ba dang
6b2(gso rig): 'di rnams la bAn te rma red pa 'byang / mus+sa ka dang / su d+ha shi ri dang / 'bras bu gsum+bi ste/ a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / tsi tra ka dang / rgya skyegs shing dang / shing d+ha ba dang / shi sha ba dang / 'di rnams ni
6b3(gso rig): skraskan dang / gcin sri ba dang / chu so na sde'u yod pa dang / sgyu chub kyi nang dang / tshil che ba dang / gzhung 'brum gyi na da dang / bad kani dang / khu chu rnams sel bar byed do// dug mo nyung dang / shing mur ba dang
6b4(gso rig): buM tse shaMl dang / na le sham dang / alpi sha dang / gan+d+hi ra chu sgog dang / sug smel dang / ba tha sna gnyis dang / dzi ra dang / shing a ra la'i 'bras bu dang / u dzA mo dau dang / yungs kar dang / shu dag dang / zi ra nag
6b5(gso rig): po dang / shing kun dang / srin bu sman pi dang ka dang / pa shu gnad dang / pany+tsa ko la zhes bya ba pi pi ling dang / pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la ba rtse lagra dang / byi mo'i lo ma dang / tsi tra ka dang / li deng r+ya 'di lnga dang /
6b6(gso rig): sman de rnams ni rlung dang / dkon dang / tshil ches pa dang / cham pa dang / sman dang / rimos na ba dang / gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang 'di rnams sel bar byed do// shu dag dang / gla sgang chen po dang / thang shing
7a1(gso rig): dang / sgron shing dang ma dong ra dang / bong ba dang / A ru ra dang / skyer ba dang / yung ba dang / ding dang ra pas kr-i s+t+ra baN+Di dang / dug mo cung dang / spyan 'di rnams ni shu dag dang skyer ba la sogs pa'i sman
7a2(gso rig): sde'i grangs su gtogs te/ zas ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs dang / rab tu 'khru ba'i nad rnams zhu zhing gcod do// tshal ches pa dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / rlung nang dang / bud med kyi nu ma na ba 'di rnams sel to// gan+da pri yang ku da /
7a3(gso rig): mig sman ra gan gyi dud pa dang / lig bu mig dang / sbrang zil dang / me tog pad+ma'i ze ba dang / lcim rtswa dang / btsod dang / ya ba sha ka dang / shing shal+lA shi li dang / shi pa shal+lA li'i khu ba dang / pu na na ga dang / sa mang+ga dang /
7a4(gso rig): tsan dan dkar po dang / me tog d+hA ta ki dang / a ma pa shwA dang / shing mngar dang / nam ska ri dang / na ma tri bri ga sha dang / rgya skyegs shing dang / r-i d+ha gser blo ma dang / mtha' ta ki dang / shing bil+la dang / pe shing ka
7a5(gso rig): dang / kA taM gA dang / pad+ma'i ge sar za ba dang / sman 'di rnams ni sman sde rnam gnyis te/ gan+d+ha pri yang bu'i snga grang su gtogaso ba dang / sman amra ba sh+ma la sogs pa de rnam+ba ni kha zas zhu ba'i tshang bar 'khru ba gcod do//
7a6(gso rig): sman 'di dag ni 'khru ba yang gcod/ nang gi sha ched dang pags pa'i sha byung ba slar 'phros 'bye ra bar byed de phen/ mkhris pa rgyas pa la pan/ rma red pa yang 'tsho bar byed do// gla sgang dang / shu dag dang / tsi tra ka
7b1(gso rig): krug drug tres dang / skyer ba dang / yung ba gnyis/ kha ba rnam gnyis la/ ka tu ka ro hi ni pu tse shel dang / ka ka tik+Sh+Na dang / go bya dang / pa thA dwang / 'bras bu gsum po a ru ra dang / skyu ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / bong nga dkar po dang
7b2(gso rig): bong nga nag po dang / khro bo dang / ru rta dang / sug smel dang / bu dag dang / 'di rnams ni bud med kyi mngal na ba dang / nu ma na ba dang / dri ma bshang gci ba dang / rdul dang / rdu ma dang / rna spabs la sogs pa sel cing 'byung ngo //
7b3(gso rig): shing nya gro dang / shing a shwat+tha dang / shing u dum bA ra dang / pad ri ka ro d+ha sna gnyis 'dzam bu gnyis la/ bri had pha la dang / d+hu sa pha la gnyis/ shing a dzu na dang / shing so ma balka dang / shing p+lak+Sha dang / shing i mra dang /
7b4(gso rig): shing many+dzu la dang / shing pi la ya dang / rgya skyegs shing dang / shing nan ti ki lI dang / shing bi ra la dang / shing dang ra dang / shring ma du ka dang / 'di rnams ni shing nya gro la sogs pa'i grangasu gtogs ti/ rma 'tsho ste phan
7b5(gso rig): 'khru ba gcod/ chag thur byung na 'byor/ chos te tshil ches pa dang / mkhris pa rgyas pa dang / khrag rgyas pa dang / skom dang tsha ba dang / lus kyi khong tsha ba dang / bud med kyi mngal na ba dang / 'di rnams sel
7b6(gso rig): te phan no// sug smel dang / ma he l-i dang / tu ru ska dang / ru rta dang / gan+d+ha pri yaM ku dang / spang spos dang / ba laM b+hU ma ka dang / sbrig ka dbug sug dang / zhog taM ku dang / tso tsa dang / gan+da pat+tA dang / rgya spos dang /
8a1(gso rig): stI ni ya dang / s+phu ma zhes bya ba sro shing gi me tog gi lu ba dang / nya phyis dang / rgya mtsho nas byung ba'i chu srin gyi sonA mo dang / thad shing dang / a ka ru dang / shri ba sa ga dang / gur kum+ba dang / tsan dan dang /
8a2(gso rig): gu gul dang / sa tsi ra sa dang / pog ker po nu mau ka dang / sun+t+ra ma dang / nA ga ga sar dang / 'di rnams ni sug smel la sogs te 'di dag dri zhim po'i sder gtogs te/ rlung nad dang bad kan rgyas pa'i nad sel/ dug thub/ pags pa'i
8a3(gso rig): sha ma dog bzang po sdug gur 'gyur/ g.yan pa dang / thor bu dang / bas glags pa'i nad 'di rnams kun sal lo// sh+ya ma dang / dani di dang / dra ban+ti dang / ka mu ka dang / dri bid shing nya rong dang / shang khri ni dang / pa ta la dang /
8a4(gso rig): R+ShA shi ri dang / ga ba ga shi dang / shi kha ri dang kaM bi l+ya ka dang / sle tras dang / shing ke rany+dza dang / ba stang tri dang / bya d+hi ga ta dang / b+ha la dang / ba hu ra sa dang / shing ro che ba rnams kyi 'bras bu ni sman sha ma la sogs pa'i
8a5(gso rig): sder gautogs te/ sman dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / snying na ba dang / chu 'gags pa dang / nad 'di rnams sel to// de ltar sman gyi sde grangs sum bcu rtsa gsum bshad pa la/
8a6(gso rig): de dag gi nang nas sman la la ma rnyed na yang / sman gyi ro dang / mthu dang yon tan 'dra ba las sman sna sbyor cig/ bkru sman dang skyugs sman la sogs pa nang sbyang ba'i sman sna tshogs 'dus par bshad pa/ sman sde'i rnam grangs
8b1(gso rig): bshad pa'i lde'u bco lnga pa rdzogs so// / snum dpyad kyi cho gar bya ba bshad pa'i le'u bcu drug pa bshad par bya'o// snum gyi nang na mchog ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ zhun mar dang / rkang dang / tshil dang / til mar
8b2(gso rig): dang bzhi'o// de ltar snum de dag ni spyir ni 'ju dka' ste lci/ bsol khong 'khru/ lus kyi khong snum par byed/ 'dzem par byed rtsa thams cad du 'gro bas na zhib mnyen/ lus kyi khrong rlan par byed do// zas snum bag 'di dang 'dra ba'i
8b3(gso rig): sman snum+b+ha bag tsan+da du gau togs pa phalnga cherA yang de dang 'dra'o// snum dang sman da dang mi 'dra ba gzhan ni rUb+hA pA zhes bya'o// de la yang snumA de dag gi nang yang zhun mar sman dang sbyar te bcos po ni ji ltar spyi ru bya bzhin du phan no//
8b4(gso rig): rkang dang tshil dang tIl mar gsum ni mkhris pa dang bad kan dang rlung sel to// de la un mAr bas ni til mor 'ju dka'o// til mar bsna ni tshil 'ju dka'o// tshil bas kyang rkang 'dzu dka'o// de la snum rnam
8b5(gso rig): gnyis zhes bya ba ni zhu na mar dang til mar ro// snum rnam gsum zhes bya ba ni zhun mar dang til mar dang rkang mar gsumo// snum rnam bzhi ni snum de bzhi la sna chen bzhi zhe bya'o// sa snum gyi sman dpyad bya ba'i nad dmig sa ni//
8b6(gso rig): chang nang du gyur pa dang / bud med kyis dub pa dang / drag shul dang / nga'i las byas pa dang / sems las chen po la zhugs pa dang gi/ mi rgan po dang / byis pa dang nyams stobs chung ba dang / skamo po dang / lus kyi khong na
9a1(gso rig): snum med de/ rtsub por gyur pa dang / khrag zad pa dang / khu chu zad pa dang / rlung nad kyis nyams thag pa dang / mig rab rig khyer te rtul ba dang / rna ba mi gsang ste legs par mi thos pa dang 'di rnams lta/ bu la
9a2(gso rig): snum gyi bcud kyis lus brta bar bya'o// brta bar bya ba de la snga thog mar dugs byas la phyis bkru sman gyis bkrus te/ sbyangs nas de'i rjes la snum gyi dpyad bya'o// ha cang khong pa ma'i drod ches pa dang / lus sbom pa dang / nyams chung zhing
9a3(gso rig): ring pa dang / brla rengs pa dang / tshad par rab tu 'khru ba dang / ma zhu ba'i be'u snabs yod de mchin pa na ba dang / lkog ma na ba dang / dbyig dug gis phog pa dang / lto ba'i nang du dmu rdzing lta bu dang / brgyal ba dang / rtag tu skyug pa dang /
9a4(gso rig): zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / bang kan gyi nad yod pa dang / skom dang che ba dang / chang gis phog ste ra ro ba dang / bud med bu btsas pa dang / sman sna nas btang ba dang / bkru sman gyis bkrus pa 'di lta bu la snum gyi dpyad bya zhing sbyin du mi
9a5(gso rig): rung ngo // de la zhun mar gyi yon tan ni sems rno mi brjed cing dran pa dang / yid gzhungs/ lus skam zhing rid pa 'di lta bu la phan no// til mar ni lto na srin bu yod pa dang / tshil ches pa dang / rlung nad can du gyur pa 'di lto bu la til
9a6(gso rig): mar phan no// lus khong yang ba dang / lus khong grims shing sha mkhrang ba dang / lto sr-i ba 'di lta bu la rkang zos na phan no// lus la rlung dang nyi mtshan gyis gdungs pa dang / lam ring por bgrod pas khong du dub pa dang / smra mangs pa
9b1(gso rig): dang rngabud med la drags pa dang / drag shul dang / las ches pa dang / srog zungs bdun lta bu zad pa dang / lus kyi khong na snum med de/ rtsub por gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa byas pas lus rid pa dang / phe ba'i drod ha cang ches te zas ha
9b2(gso rig): cang 'ju ba dang / rtsa sgo kun rlung gis 'gags shing chod pa 'di lta bu la tshil zos na phan no// de la tshil ni lhag par rus pa'i tshigs kha bye ba dang / rus pa chag pa dang snod bsnyud pa dang / lto ba'i nang grol na ba dang / mas
9b3(gso rig): tshig pa dang / lus rmus te rmA byung ba dang / rkang lag gi tshigs bur ba dang / mo mtshan na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / klad pa na ba dang / 'dri lta bu la tshil phyan no// til ma ri ni lhag par dbyar zla tha chung dang / ston zla ra ba'i ngo la
9b4(gso rig): phan no// zhun mar ni ston zla 'bring po dang / tha chungs kyi ngo la phan no// rkang dang tshil ni dpyid ka phran no// snum 'di rnams gang yang rung dus tshigs dang mi sbyor bar 'phral gang bab du gtong n-i/ tshes grangs kyi nyi ma bzang ba dang /
9b5(gso rig): sprin dang yul ngan med cing yul bzang ba'i tshe tha~Mng zhig/ til mar ni dgun zla grang lhags pa che bra'i tshe btang na phan no// zhun mar ni dbyer zla ra ba dang / 'bring po che ba'i dus na mtshan mo 'thungs na phan no// mkhris pa dang rlung
9b6(gso rig): nad du gyur na zhun mar ni mtshan mo yang btang du rung ro// yang rlung dang mkhris pa lta bu nad sna gnyis 'dres par na na/ til mar dang zhun mar mtshan mo btang du rung ngo // rlung dang bad kan gyi nang du gyur na/ zhun mar dang sman dang sbyar ba
10a1(gso rig): nyin par mthong zhig/ de blan sman zhun mar dang sman dang sbyar ba'i til dang kha zas la sogs pa rnams dang / spyan mas btang ba dang / sman sna nas btang ba dang / lus mar gyis bsku ba dang / sman bskol ba'i khu
10a2(gso rig): ba khar blugs shing dbo ba dang / mgo dang rna ba dang mig tu sman bsku zhing blugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyang ran pa tsam du btang ngo // ro rnam drug la sogs pa sna re ra ba dang / ro sna gnyis pa dang / ro sna gsum pa dang / sna bzhi pa dang /
10a3(gso rig): sna lnga pa la sogs pa sman sbyar ba'i ro bro bir sna grangs drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs par phye ba de las/ snum gyi dngos po mar la sogs pa ro logs shig na tha dad pa ma yin te/ ji ltar zhe na/ sman mar sbyor ba yang / sman sna mang po gsogs
10a4(gso rig): liHmar nyung ngu byas pas ni/ mar gyi ro zil gyis gnan to// lhag par bro ba med pas na ro drug cu nyid kyi nang du 'dus so// dper na ji skad du bstan pa/ sman bskol ba'i khu ba dang da sa ma btung ba'i ro de yang chu'i r-i ci bro ba la logs
10a5(gso rig): shig na rgyu lhag pa med do// ro drug cu nyid kyi nang du 'dus// yang ni sman mar myur du gang phan pa de bzang ste/ de la thun chung ngu zos na thun gnyis kyis 'ju'o// tshod 'bring du zos na thun bzhis 'ju'o// tshod cher zos na nyin zhag gcig gi
10a6(gso rig): 'ju'o// de ltar sman dang sbyar ba'i til mar ram/ sman mar gang za yang rung ste/ mi nyam dang nad kyi dmigs la sbyor la/ sngar ni tshod chung ngu nas bza' bar bya'o// yang bkru sman gyis bkru bar 'dod na kha rtsang lta bu zas zos
10b1(gso rig): lad nang lta bu gu ste khong na yang / zhun mar dang dngas ma 'ba' zhig tshod cher mang du bza'o// mar 'thungs pas nad zhi bar byas pa zhig la zas kyang cher ma zos te khong bkres na mar 'bring tsam du zos na phan no// sman mar gyis nyams btsag
10b2(gso rig): brta zhing sha skye bar bya na/ dro ba khar sman mar nyung zad bzhu ste/ sha khu gdungs la dro cha tsam gyi nang du blugs la 'thungs nas/ de'i rdzas kha zas snum bag zos la chang gis mnan na phan no// yang byis pa gzhonu lta bu dang / mi rgan po dang /
10b3(gso rig): rtag tu skom dang che bo dang / mar za ba 'am/ 'thung mi phod pa dang / chang nad che ba dang / rtag tu bud med dang phrad de/ rtag tu kha zas snum bag za ba lta bu dang / drod chung ste kha zas mi 'ju ba lta bu dang / skyid de bde bar 'dug 'dug pa'i mi dang /
10b4(gso rig): sman stobs chung ba'i nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa lta bu dang / lto snyi ba dang / nad dkyil mi che ba lta bu dang / sog tsha ba'i dus dang / nad kyis rid par gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mar btang ba ni/ dro ba smon mar nyung shas bzhu ste cig tu 'thung
10b5(gso rig): maHkhu ba dron pos phul te 'thungs pa'i rjes la/ kha zas snum bag dang chang 'thung zhig/ de la nad dmigs kyi rim pa dang sbyar te sman mar btang ba'i thabs ni/ lus kyi stong na nad yod na ni kha zas zos pa'i rjes la mar phyis btung /
10b6(gso rig): khong pa'i nang lus kyi bar na nad yod pa ni kha zas phyed zos nas sman mar btung ngo // lus kyi smad na nad yod na ni/ dro khar lho ltong la sman mar btang na/ rjes la kha zas dang tshil nan 'thungs na nad sel to// sman mar btang ba'i thabs
11a1(gso rig): pa 'di ltar byas na/ phan pa'i stobs mthu yang / lus kyi rim pa bzhin du skye'o// de ltar spyan mar 'thungs pa las mar cung zad ma zhu na/ chu tshan gdu gdu ba'i dAngs ma khas bzod tsam 'thungs na/ mar bde blag tu 'ju bar 'gyur//
11a2(gso rig): sman mar la sogs pa zos te/ snum kha'i nang du chags na/ chu chen gdus pa khas bzod tsam gyis kha bkru'o// e raN+Da'i khu ba gdus pa dang / ba la ka zhes bya ba go ba dang 'di gnyisu bsdus pa'i khu ba ni btung du mi rung ngo // gal te kha rtsang ngam
11a3(gso rig): khar nyin lta bu sman mar 'thungs pa las zhu 'am ma zhu gtol med de the tsom za na/ chu tshan gdu gdu ba yang 'thung zhig/ de 'thungs pas khong du ma zhu la/ mau zhu ba'i gdung sgregs mnan po ma yin sgregs pa yang tha mal par 'ong // khong yang
11a4(gso rig): zhing zas yi gar 'ong bar gyur na/ kha zas ran tsam du bza' zhing 'tshal nan kyang ci ran du 'thung zhig/ de ltar sman mar 'thungs nas zhu ba'i rjes la/ kha zas bza' ba ni khu ba ro bag dang / zas bad kan du mi 'gyur ba dang / ha cang zas
11a5(gso rig): snum bag nyid ma yin pa dang / kha zas grang dro ma 'dres par bza'o// sman mar 'thungs pa lta bu la kha lag kyang chu dron pos bkru/ bud med dang 'phrad du mi rung / mtshan mo yang gnyid par nyal/ bshang gci 'ong na mi dgag/
11a6(gso rig): drag shul gyi las mi bya/ khro zhing tshig pa za ba dang / mya ngan dang / grang ba 'am/ nyi tshan la 'dug pa 'am/ rlung drag po langs pa'i khar 'gro ba'am/ rta zhon te phan tshun 'khyam pa 'am/ lam du zhugs pa dang / mang du
11b1(gso rig): smra ba dang / stan ha cang mi mtho ba la 'dug pa dang / sngas ha cang mtho ba 'am/ dma' ba 'di rnams lta bu mi bya'o// nyin par nyal ba dang / dud pa dku ba'i nang na 'dug pa dang / rdul khrod na 'dug pa 'di rnams kyang mi rung ste/ de lta bas na
11b2(gso rig): sman mar ci srid 'thungs pa de srid kyi bar du/ cho ga de ltar bya zhing mi rung ba rnams spang ngo // sman ma r-i dang 'dra bar bkru sman btang ba dang / sna nas btang ba dang / sman mas btang ba rnams kyang tshul de dang 'dra bar nad byang gi bar
11b3(gso rig): du cho ga yun de srid du bsrung bar bya'o// de la nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ sman mar btang ba'i che ga bkru sman dang 'dra ste/ sman mar gyi cho ga yang de bzhin du bya'o// de la lto snyin ni sman mar nyi ma gsum du btang ngo // lto sra na
11b4(gso rig): ni nyi ma bdun du btang ngo // sman mor btang bas nad rtse zhol te/ khong legs par snum par gyur na/ de phan chad kha zas kyi cho ga bya'o// de ltar sman mar btang bas nad rtse zhil bar gyur na/ stod smad du dbugs dbyung ba
11b5(gso rig): tha mal bar 'ong / pho ba'i me drod ches te 'bar/ bshang bsnum la mi sri ba 'byung / mar dang snum bag mi 'dod de skyo// lus snyom ste 'di ltar gyur na/ nad rtse zhil zhing lus kyi khong legs par sum por gyur pa yi no//
11b6(gso rig): lus kyi khong rtsub na ni tshul 'di dang 'dra ste/ 'di las bzlog ste blta'o// gal te sman mar dang snum gyi tshod ma zin tam/ phan pa ma yin par zos sam/ btang ba'i dus ma yin par 'thungs sam/ kha zas log pa ha cang snum
12a1(gso rig): ches pa 'am/ bsil zhing rtsub pa 'am/ zas ma zhu bzhin du zos pa'am/ mtshan mo mi nyal zhing nyin par phan tshun 'khyam pa dang / mi mthun pa log pa byas pa 'di lta bu las sman mar ma zhu ste/ snum drags par gyur na/
12a2(gso rig): gdong ba dang lus kyi sha mdog ser/ snabs dang mi tshol ma mang / thur du tshad par 'khru ste/ de lta bu las nad ni lus skrangs pa dang / gzhang 'brum khrag tshad du 'ong ngo // khong rmya lus dgye chu mi shes te/ rengs bag du 'dug/ sems myos te blong
12a3(gso rig): bag du 'dug/ g.yan pa dang / mdze dang rims nad rtag tu skyug pa dang / khong na lto sgo/ mgo 'khor la sogs pa dang / 'di lta bu'i nang du 'gyur ro// de lta bu la dpyad bya ba ni zos dang skom dbri zhing bsdams pa dang / skyugs sman btang dugs bya/ zas
12a4(gso rig): dang skom rnams rtsub pa'i bag btang / tshal nan dar ba dang / a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / 'di lta bu mnan pa'i khu ba dang / dar ba bskol ba dang / nas dang / ci tse dgod dang / khre dgod dang / pi pi ling dang / 'bras bu ga sum po a ru ra dang / bai ru ra
12a5(gso rig): dang / skyu ru ra gsum/ sbrang rtsi la sbyar te btang ba 'am/ yang na a ru ra btags pa dang / ba gcin dang gu gul bsres nas 'thungs na phan no// mdor na nad dmigs ji ltar mi bde ba dang sbyar la dpyad byas na mar drags pa'i nad 'bya // yang de
12a6(gso rig): lta bu la dpyad du bya ba ni kha zas mi bza' ni bza' bar smyung ba mi nus na yang / kha zas rtsub po bza' ba'i dpyad byas na smyung ba byas pa dang 'dra'o// gal ta mar drags pa'i nad las bkru sman btang dgos par gyur na/ nyi ma gsum gyi bar
12b1(gso rig): du kha zas snum pa khu ba drod bag dang / yul skam sa nas byung ba'i sha las khu ba brod bag du byas pa dang / kha zas drod bag zos la/ nang nub du dugs bya zhing / nyi ma gsum du snum bag gi drod dang / dugs de ltar byas nas/ de'i rjes la bkru sman bta //
12b2(gso rig): skyugs sman btang ba ni mi sha dang tshil ches/ bad kan mang/ blod ma snyoms te zas res 'ga' 'jug ris 'ga' mi 'ju ba de lta bu ni nyin zhag gcig bod kan skye ba'i kha zas byin la/ phyi de nyin skyugs sman thong zhig/ yang zas snum bag gis bskyed
12b3(gso rig): paskyed pa/ bad kan can de lta bu la sngar zas rtsub po byin te/ de'i rjes la kha zas snum bag gis khong snum par byas nas bkru sman thong zhig/ dpyad de ltar byas na mar dang snum bag las na du gyur pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro// mar dang snum lta bur ma 'phrod de nad
12b4(gso rig): du gyur pa kha zas kyi dpyad byas pas ma byang na/ sman btang ba'i dpyad byas pas ma byang na/ sman bting ba'i dpyad byas pa kyi dri ma phyin par 'gyur ro// byis pa chung ngu dang / rgan po la sogs pa mar dang snum bag spong mi nus la/ cho ga dka'
12b5(gso rig): na 'brel du snum gyi dpyad 'di skyo zhing gnod par yang mi 'gyur gyi gyis shig/ bya ba'i thabs ni mar brngos la hA/ du btang ngam/ thug pa'i nang du btab la blud/ yang na til btags pa'i nang du mar btab la/ bu ram bskol ba'i khu bas
12b6(gso rig): btang ste btung ngo // yang na 'bras dang til mar dang sran ma sha dang / sna gsum gyi thug pa nang du yang mar 'di bzhin du btab la btung ngo // 'o ma bskol ba dron mo'i nang du mar btab pa'i thug pa'am zho mngal ma zho ga chu bor la/ bu ram gyis
13a1(gso rig): btab ste blud pa'i thug pa de lta bu rnam pa drug dang / mar rkang tshil dang til dang sna bzhi 'bras dang sna lnga'i thug pa dang / spyir drug dang / yang thug pa rnam pa lnga po 'di dag dang / thug pa sna bdun po 'di rnams ni
13a2(gso rig): 'phral du lus kyi khong sdum par 'gyur te/ lan tshwa cher gdab po// thug pa 'di dag ni bad kan du mi 'gyur// lus rtsub par mi 'gyur/ yang mdze nod dang lus skang bag dang / gcin rtag tu 'ong zhing snyi ba 'di lta bu la bu ram dang yul
13a3(gso rig): gsha ra sa nas byung ba'i sha dang / 'o ma dang til dang / sran ma sha dang / chang dang zho rnams bzar mi rung // snum gyi che ga dang / dpyad byas gnod par ma gyur na/ sman 'bras bu gsum po dang / pi pi ling dang / a ru ra dang / gu gul la sogs
13a4(gso rig): pa bskol la thong zhig/ de ltar btang na nad rnying yang 'byung la/ lus kyi khong nas drod skye/ khong pa nang gi nad kun 'byung / srog zungs bdun 'phrul du brta/ nyams stobs dang bzhin mdog bzang por 'gyur/ dbang po rnams brtan/ rgan skra
13a5(gso rig): lo brgya thub par 'gyur te/ mar rtag tu bza' ba'i yon tan de ni de ltar 'gyur ro// snum la dpyad kyi cho gar bya bI le'u ste bcu drug pa rdzogs so// / de nas dugs bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// de la dugs kyi bye brag ni
13a6(gso rig): rnam pa bzhi ste/ dugs bya ba dang / bag zan dang sman du sbyar bas lus la bcing zhing dugs bya ba dang / dugos tha mal ba dang / chu lums dang rnam pa bzhi'o// de la dugs zhes bya ba ni me las bsros pa yin te/ de la yang ji ltar
13b1(gso rig): zhon/ mo mngag la gos sam thong lcags sam lag pa'i thal mo mo la bsros pa la sogs pas dwags bya'o// bag zan dang sman du sbyar ba'i dugs lus la glan cing btsong ba no bag phyo'am 'bru sna tshogs btags la spyan shA
13b2(gso rig): phabs dang nye'u shing dang / thang shing dang gur kum dang / a ru ra dang / ldum bur sna dang / e rA d+ha'i rtsa bo dang / lus gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang / tshwa dang / dar ba dang / 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / 'di rnams kyis skra mor
13b3(gso rig): sbrus la lan tshwa tsher btub ste btsos la ris kyi steng du bdal te/ lus gI ran par grasu zhing bcings na dugs 'dis ni rlung nad 'byin par 'gyur ro// gal te bad kun dang 'dres pa'i nang du gyur na ni dugs de'i nang du byi'u rug pa la sogs
13b4(gso rig): dang sbyar la dugs bya'o// mkhris pa'i nad la ni shing shug pa dang sbyar ro// dugs glan te da ltar sbyar ba las gal te sla bas lus la mi chags shing ras kyi mi thub na mar dang til mar la sogs pa snam gyis bsnun te/ yang dang yang
13b5(gso rig): bsre zhing pags pa ma rul ba dri mi zhim pa ma yin pas phyi rol nas dugs bya'o// pags pa de lta blo ma rnyed na sman rlung sal ba'i lo ma a.A shwa gan+da 'am/ e raN+Da 'am/ dar ram pal sna 'am ras kyis g.yogs shing dkris la mtshan
13b6(gso rig): mo dugs byas na ni nyin par mi dgos kyi khrol cig/ nyin par dugs byas na ni mtshan mo mi dgos kyi khrol cig/ de yi dugs tha mal pa zhes bya ba ni bag phye ba dang mar chur sbyar te bcas pa'i bag zan sla mos/ gang na ba'i thog du glan
14a1(gso rig): cing bdug pa dang / gyo mo'i dum bu dang / phag dum dang / rdo ba dang / sa phye ma dang / gasdo ma'i lo ma dang / 'bras la sogs pa 'bru rnams dang / lug gi ril ma dang bye ma dang / phub ma la sogs
14a2(gso rig): pa thabs du mas btsos sam/ brngos pa'i dugs kyis yul gyi rnams dang dus dang sbyar zhing dugs bya'o// de la sman ku'i lums bya ba'i dpyad ni/ shing shi kru dang / shi kru'i rtsa ba dang / lo ma dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa ji snyed pa dang
14a3(gso rig): shing e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang / lo ma la sogs pa dang / ka rany+dza dang / bye'u rug pa dang / koR+Sha ka dang / shaung shi ri sha dang / ldum bu ba shaM dang / 'od ma dang / shing a ra ka dang / ma li ti dang / d+hiR+YA bin+ta dang / gso ma'i lo ma dang /
14a4(gso rig): shu dag la sogs pa dang / yul gsher sa nas byung ba'i sha dang / nya dang / ngang drur la sogs pa'i sha dang / sman gyi rtsa ba sna bcu pa dang 'di rnams la sogs pa nad dmigs dang sbyar la nad lci na sman 'di kun sna tshang bar gsogs
14a5(gso rig): te brdungs la chang dang tshwa dang 'o ma dang chu la sogs pa dang sbyar te btsos la bum pa'i nang du blugs la gang na bar smin gyi rlangs pa dron pos gar na ba'i dmigasu bdug cing lums bya'o// yang na rlangs pas mi bdug par sman bco
14a6(gso rig): ba'i khu ba dro tsha tsam bum pa'i khar phra mor bstod pa'am/ sgrub pu ring por bstod pa'i/ blugs pa'i kha nas sman gyi khu ba'i rgyun byung nas nad kyi steng du blugs la gang na bar sman gyi rlangs pa dran shing sman khu'i lums bya'o// de ltar
14b1(gso rig): thAsrA sa / spyad du rgyu ma // smras rgyun gnagasas na na pa ng+gA gang rgyun nga
14b2(gso rig): lus gas na na de thams cad la ban par 'gyu'o// nad byuchu stsa la dI skr-i hrI na gas rkye drug nA gnang bgyug nas med du 'ong ba dang / rnaMs gnas kyi gnon mi d+hA dang / rlu na la sogs pa la phanau// de lta bu sargyas sbyin
14b3(gso rig): 'jug pa la kha zas snum brag bzla' zhing zas zhu nasna snga dro chu lums bya'o// de ltar lu mas bya ba'i ched ni nad pa'i nad dmigs tshe chung dang / yul-i rnams dang dbyar dgun gyi dus dang sbyar la lums che chung 'bring gar ran pa chod de las dpag
14b4(gso rig): te bya'o// de las bad kin gyi nad dmigs shas tshi na ni smen khong rtsub par 'gyur ba dang sbyar lo chu lums bya'o// mi rang bzhin rlung dang bad kan can zhig la rlung nad smyos te rtsub par gyur na sman rtsub pa dang snum bag yod pa gnyis ga dang sbyar ba'i
14b5(gso rig): nu lums bya'o// yang nad pa pho ba'i nang du rlung nad zhugs pa la/ long ga'i nang du bad kon gyi nad zhugs par gyur pa 'di lta bu la ni sngar pho bA'i gnas la phan pa'i lums rtsub mo'i lums bya'o// long gi'i nang na bad kan yod pa ni so so'i na
14b6(gso rig): kyai byi brag dong sbyar te snum pag yod po'i chums bya'o// de la drugs dang lums gang byed kyang rung hU~M/ sta zur ngo chu sa bar dang / mog dang rtsig pa'i 'bras bu dang / snying dang 'di rnams la ngogs chung ngu bya'o// yang na ni ma byed cig lums
15a1(gso rig): legs par byas pa'i tshul ni khong drang zhing bsil ba kun mod zug cing na ba byung lus dang rkang lag 'jam pa de lta bur gyur na lums legs pa yin te lums kyi rje su lus dal gyis mnye zhing de'i rjes la chu dron pos
15a2(gso rig): lus khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu snum btang ba'i cho ga gyis shig/ yang lums ha cang drags na nyin du gyur pa'i nad dmigs ni/ mkhris pa dang khrag rgyas te tsha ba'i nad skya skom dang che/ myos shing brgyal ba'am/ bog par 'gyur/
15a3(gso rig): 'gags rkang lag na mgo 'khor/ rkang lag gi tshigs kun na rims tsha bas 'debs/ lus kyi sha tshig sta nag po dang dmar po thig thig por snang lums ha cang drags na skyug bro ba 'di lta bu'i nyen du 'gyur ro// lums de ltar
15a4(gso rig): ha cang drags te/ tsha ba dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / skyug bro ba la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang dug gis phog pa dang / nas tshigs 'khus pa'i tsha la sogs pa'i sman btang ngam/ me ba tsi' btab bam/ mes tshig gam/ tshad pas btab
15a5(gso rig): bam/ skyug bro 'am/ snying mi dran te myos pa 'di rnam sa lta bu la/ lums rtsi a raN+Da dang / nye'u shing lta bu dang / nya dang chu bya sna tshogs lta bu ni/ bsil zhing lci ba'o// tsha zhing rno ba na le sham lta bu dang / drod che ba'i sman tshingad ka dang / dbyi
15a6(gso rig): lo ma 'di lta bu rnams sbyar te so so'i nad dmigs las lums ci rigs par byas na nad dmigs kyi nyan de lta bur mi 'gyur ro// lums rtsir bzang ba ni rlon zhing zhu ba yod pa sra te tshos dka' ba spyi bag dang / 'byar
15b1(gso rig): bag du 'dug pa dang / snum bag dang / rtsub pa'i bag dang / rtsa'i nang du 'gror rung ba/ zhib pa de lta bu'i sman ni lums rtsir bzang ngo // lums kyis nad dang / nyen du mi 'gyur ba'i sman rtsi ni 'jam pa dang / rtsub pa dang / zhib pa dang / 'byar
15b2(gso rig): ba spyi bag 'dug pa dang / zhu ba gsher bag can 'di lta bu la sbyar na lums legs te nad du gyur pa la rtse zhil te phan par 'gyuraro// mdor nu sman kha ba dang / bsku ba dang / mngar bag 'di gsum yod pa phal cher sbyar na lums nyes po'i
15b3(gso rig): nad thams cad rtse gzhil cing phan par 'gyur ro// de ltar lums ha cang drags pa las nad du gyur pa de slar bcos pa'i babs kyis nad rtsi zhil bar 'gyur te/ phan pa'i rtags ni gong du lums drags pa'i nyen smos pa rnams byang la
15b4(gso rig): nyams stobs skye bar tshor na de ni lums drags pa'i nad phyin pa zhes bya'o// yang lums dregs ches te nad tu gyur ba de rtse zhil ba'i thabs ha cang drags ches na yang / sha mdangs kyi pags pa dang chu ba dang / rkang lag rnams
15b5(gso rig): 'khums pa 'gyur/ snying 'phar zhing na smra mi nus 'groms pa'i nyo byung ste lhung mchu dang lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / pags pa rnams nag por 'gyur ba de lta ni ha cang rtse gzhi la drags pa'i nad yino// de la dugs byar mi
15b6(gso rig): rung ba'i dmigs ni ha tsang chen po sbom po dang / rlung ches te khong rtsub pa dang / rid par gyur te nyams chung ba dang / brgyal ba dang sngar lums drags pa las slar gso zhing dpyad bya dgos pa dang / glo na ba dang / glo
16a1(gso rig): rdol ba dang / srog zungs bdun po zad de lus skam par song ba dang / lus khur ram las kyis dubu pa lta bu drung / chang las nad du gyur pa lta bu dang / mig rang rib za ba dang / dgu rdzing du gyur tI sto ba cher skyes pa
16a2(gso rig): dang / shu ba mched pa dang / mdzen du'o nang sbrang bgu dang / tshab mkhris pa'i nad yod pa dang 'o ma dang zho dang mar 'thungs pa dang / sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa dang bkru sbyin bting ba dang / lus snang ba dang gzhung 'brum/ khrag ched 'ong ba dang / sems
16a3(gso rig): 'khrugs pa dang / mya ngan gyis btab pa dang / 'jigs shing bag che ba lta bu yod pa dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa 'am mig ser gyis btab pa'am/ skye sbab kyi nang yod pa 'am gcin sI ste rtag tu 'ong ba 'di lta bu dang / spyir mkhris
16a4(gso rig): pa'i nad yod pas tsha ba'i nad che ba 'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung bud med sbram ma dang / zla mtshan zags pa dang / bu ba ces pa lta bu dang / 'di lta bu la lums byar mi rung ngo // gal te sbrum ma 'am zla mtshan zag pa dang bu btsas pa 'di lta bu
16a5(gso rig): la lums mi byar mi rung ba 'am/ dug gis phog ste lu mas bya dgos na yang lums mi drag pa 'jam por gyis shig/ de la lums bya ba'i nad dmigs ni bad kaun ches te dbugs mi bi de ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang / cham pas btab pa
16a6(gso rig): dang / skyigs bus btab pa dang / lho sbos pa dang / bshang gci gnyis ka 'gags te dbyung du mi rung ba dang / mgul subs shing skad 'gags pa dang / rlung nad kyi bag tu mi bde ba dang / bad kan rgyas pa dang / be'u snabs
16b1(gso rig): yod de mchin pa na ba dang / lus dgye rgu mi shes te khong rengs pa dang / lus lci ba dang / rlig rlugs kyi nad yod pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba'i nad dang / da rgan lus nang du rku ba'am/ phyir dgye ba'i nad kyang rung rlung nad kyis zug
16b2(gso rig): thabs smra nu ba dang / chu 'gags pa dang / thor bu chen po byung ba 'am/ chen bu skrangs pa 'am pagos pa'i nang du thor bu 'byung la phyir rdol du mi rung ba lte bu dang / skyes bu khu ba 'gags te 'ong du mi rung ba dang rlung nad che ba dang / 'di rnams lta
16b3(gso rig): bu la so so'i nad dmigs dang mthun par sman sbyar la lums dang dugs bya'o// yang mi la rlung nad yod pa'am tshos te tshil ches pa'am/ bad kan rgyas pa de lta bu la lums btsos shing gdu gdu ba mi dgos par khang pa rlung med pa dron po'i
16b4(gso rig): nang du gos bsros la dron po gyon te rdul dbyung po dang gos lci bar gyon cing rdul bar bya ba dang / sngangs par bya zhing rdul gdon par byas na lums pa mi dgos par phan no// yang ma la btso ba'i lus btsan po che ma yin par tha mal par zan dang /
16b5(gso rig): sman du sbyar bas bcos pas lus la di kI zhing 'dug pa dang / chang mang du blud la dugs byas na phan no// rdul mang du dbyung ba'i thabs dang / khro bar byas pas rdul dbyung ba dang / bkres par bya ba dang / skom par bya ba dang / nyi tshan la
16b6(gso rig): bzhag pa 'di lta bus kyang bad kan la sogs pa'i nad lums bya mi dgos par phyin par rung ngo // de lta bas na lus dang khong pa nang gi nad yod pa la mar dang til la sogs pa snum gyi dpyad kyis ni nad bsrul lo// nad bsrul ba de khong
17a1(gso rig): pa nang khrol gyi nang du song yang rung srog gzungs bdun gyi nang du song ngam rkang lag gi nang du song ngam nad rung ba'i nang du zhon kyang rung / de lta bu la lums sam dugs byas na snum gyis bskul ba'i nad de snyi zhing sla bar gyur
17a2(gso rig): nas khong du sdud do// khong du nad lus pa dang bkru sman gyis bkrus te nad kyi dbyis dbyung ngo // dugs dang lums kyi cho ga ste le'u bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// / skyugs sman dang po klu sman btang ba'i cho ga'i le'u bco brgyad pa bshad par
17a3(gso rig): bya'o// bad kan rgyas pa'i nad dam bad kan rgyas pa rlung ngam/ mkhris pa dang 'dres kyang rung ste/ de lta bu'i sman la skyugs sman thong zhig/ tshul 'di dang 'dra bar mkhris pa rgyas pa 'i nad la ni bkru sman thong zhig/ yang rims gsar pa dang /
17a4(gso rig): chod pa 'khru ba dang / thur du mkhris pa dang khrag 'khru ba dang / glo gcong chen po skem byed dang / mdze dang gcin snyi ba dang / 'brum chen dang thor bu 'byung ba'i nad dang / rkang pa cher skrangs pa'i nad dang snying mi dran te myos par gyur pa dang / lud
17a5(gso rig): lu ba dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / snying 'phar ba dang / bud med nu ma na ba dang / ro stod yan chad kyi nad mi pa 'di rnams dang nad thams cad la skyugs sman btang na phan no// de la skyugs sman btang du mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni bud med
17a6(gso rig): sbrum ma dang / rlung nad yod de khong rtsub pa dang / bkres pa dang rtag tu sdug bsngal ba dang byis pa chung ngu dang / mi rgan po dang skem po dang tsho ste sbom po dang glo skam na ba dang / mtshon gyis rmas pa dang / nyams chung ba dang / rtag tu
17b1(gso rig): smon pa dang / mtshor ba na ba dang / mig rab rib khyer ba dang / lho na srin bu yod pa dang / khar khrag dang / rlung du 'dres par 'byung ba dang / sau na ba dang / skad 'dzer bu dang / chu sri ba dang / dmu rdzing dang / skran dang / sman btang ba yang
17b2(gso rig): yang slon du mi rung ba dang / ha cang drod che ba dang / gzhang 'brum gyi nad dang / rtug skam gyis btab pa dang / mgo 'khor ba dang / rtsibs logs rdo bzhin sra bas rem rim por nad dkyil chags pa dang / glo na ste rtsib logasu zug pa dang
17b3(gso rig): rlung nad kyi bag 'di lta bu la skyugs sman btang du mi rung ngo // yang khrag sman btang du mi rung ba ni btsan dug 'thungs sam/ dbyig dug 'thungs sam/ kha zas ma zhu ba 'am kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa 'am/ be'u snabs las
17b4(gso rig): rim su gyur tam/ rtag tu skyugs sman btang yang skyug tu mi rung ba la skyugs sman mi btang bar/ gang du smos kyang dug 'thungs sam/ skyugs sman mi btang du myi rung ba'i nad dmigs zhig yin na 'di rnams lta bu la skyugs
17b5(gso rig): sman thong zhig/ nad dmigs gzhan dang sbyar te skyugs sman btang ba'i rjes la sman gyi dung pa sbu gu gnas bting ste bdug tu rung ngo // btsan dug dang dbyig dug gis phog pa dang / zas ma zhu ba 'am/ kha zas mi 'phrod pa zos pa
17b6(gso rig): 'di rnams lta bu la skyugs sman btang ba'i rje sa la dud pa sbu gu nas btang zhing bdug pa dang / zas kyi cho gas bstan pa 'di rnams byar myi rung // de la bkru sman gyis bkru zhing gsor rung ba'i nad ni skran dang gzhang 'brum khrag
18a1(gso rig): tshang 'brum bu dang gzhogs phyed na ste bskyod mi nus pa dang / mig ser dang / rims yun du lon te bying ba dang / dmu rdzing dang / dbyig dug dang / rtag tu skrag pa dang / mcher ba na ba dang / sha mdog ser
18a2(gso rig): por gyur pa'i nad dang / mig rab rib za ba dang / mig sngon por gyur pa dang mig rtsi bor za ba dang long ga nA ste ba'i 'og tu na ba dang / mo mtshan na ba dang / pho mtshan na ba dang / khong pa'i nang kun na ba dang / lto na srin bu yod pa dang / rme red pa dang
18a3(gso rig): dreg gam khar khrag dang rlung 'dres par skyug gam/ mgo bo yan chad kyi nad dang / khrag rgyas pa dang / gcin 'gag cing sri ba dang / rtug skam gyis btab pa 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman gyis bkrus na phan no// mdze nad dang / gcin sI
18a4(gso rig): sta za khur byung ba la ni/ skyugs sma na btang na phan no// rims sar pa dang / pho ba'i drod chung ba dang / mkhris pa dang // khrag ched du byung ba dang / glo rdol te/ lus rmas sam/ gzhang 'brum khrag tshad 'ong ba 'am/ khong du mtshon
18a5(gso rig): lus te ma phyin pa dag lho sra ste 'khrur mi rung ba dang / lus tsho ste tshil che ba dang / skem po dang 'di rnams lta bu la bkru sman btang zhing bkrur mi rung ngo // de la skyugs sman dang bkru sman gnyis gang yang rung ba'i dus ni grong dro
18a6(gso rig): ran pa'i dus la bya ste/ de yang dpyid zla 'bring po dang dbyar zla tha chung dang / ston zla chung dang zla ba 'di rnams la bkru sman dang skyugs sman gang yang rung ba btang du rung ngo // dus 'di'i tshe snum btang ba'i cho ga bzhin du yang byas/
18b1(gso rig): drugs dang lums kyang cho ga bzhin du bsal sang skyugs sman gtong na deng bad kan bskong ba'i kha zas nya dang til dang / ma sha mon dre ru dang / bad kan skye bar 'gyur ba'i zas rnams zos la/ mtshan mo gnyid log par byas nas kha zas
18b2(gso rig): legs par zhu ba dang / nang par lus bsrung ba'i bkra shis byas la kha zas gzhan mi za bar skyugs sman btang / mi rgan po dang / byis pa dang / nyams chung ngu skye ba dang / sman stobs chung zhing zhan pa 'di rnams so so'i rigs
18b3(gso rig): par btang ba'i thabs ni mkhris pa rgyas shing tsha ba che na 'o ma dang bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/ bu ram gyi khu ba las thong zhig/ rlung nad la ni shau khu 'am/ mar khu 'am thug po dang snum bag las thong zhig/ bad kan rgyas pa la ni sbrang rtsi'i
18b4(gso rig): khu ba dang / chang dang chu dron po lus btang ngo // rgyun gzhon dang nyams me chung gi thabs kyang tshul 'di bzhin du sbyar ro// sbugs spyan btang ba yang byabs tshur bathungs te gre ba man chang gang bar g+his la sman no// so so'i nang dmigs
18b5(gso rig): dang sbyar te/ skyugs smin du gtong ba yang rung ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang / rgya me tshwa dang / lce myang tshwa yang btab li mo'i chod da pa/ skyugs pa sra sti'i drod du sbyor la sman thong zhig/ sman gdong bu'i tshe nad pa'i khu shar phyogasu bltas la
18b6(gso rig): sman blung ngo // sngags kyis kyang gdab par bya'o// pram+b+ha dak+Sha shi ba/ bud dren dra/ b+ha tsan+d+ra arka nI la na la/ ri dir su ma b+hu ta sad+d+ha sa tsa pany+tsa ba/ sa ra yo na me ba ri Shi na ma da bA me mar tam su d+he bod ta ma nA ga nA na
19a1(gso rig): Shud dzAm na ma s+yA ste/ skyugs sman 'thungs la skad cig ci ran du bsdang la de nas slon bro ba'i sems bskyed la/ dang kar 'khyil cing khar mchil ma mang po 'ong bar gyur na bya sgro 'jam po 'am/ chu ba sI ba 'jam pos
19a2(gso rig): bkug cing drang ngo // bkug cing smon pa ni grib dang lce khyi ba'i drung ma smad par smon to// de la skyug mi dro bzhin du yang nan gyis skyugs shing slon du mi rung // skyug blo bzhin smon par gyur na yang ma 'gogs par slon cig/ de ltar smon pa'i tshe na
19a3(gso rig): stan mthon po pus mo'i thad ka tsam du mtho ba'i steng du tsog pur 'dug la 'bral ba dang / blo ga yas g.yon mis bsten nas smon to// de'i tshe smon pa de lte ba'i thad kar btsir/ rgyab nas btsir zhing gyen du phul la slon cig/ de la bad
19a4(gso rig): kan rgyas pa'i skyugs sman ni sman rno bo'i bag la nA le sham lta bu dang / bsil bag tu u shi ra 'am/ tsan dan nama?/ ga pur lta bu la sogs pa la sbyar ro// drod cha ba'i bag lA tsi tra ka/ pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la sogs pa lta bu dang / chu bar gtogs
19a5(gso rig): pa tsha ba rnam gsum dang / shi kru la sogs pa 'di lta bu las skyugs sman du sbyar te btang ngo // mkhris pa rgyas pa'i skyugs sman ni ro mngar bag shing dngar 'o ma 'am bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/ kha ra 'am/ rgun 'bru lta bu dang / bsil bag tu
19a6(gso rig): u shi ra 'am/ tsan dan nam/ ga pur la sogs pa la sbyaro// rlung dang bad kan du 'dres pa'i nad la ni mngar bag dang sbyar ba dang lan tshwa las sbyar la btang // de ltar sgyur du sbyar te gyen du phol nas nang phyin pa'i tshad ni bad kan 'byung ba
19b1(gso rig): zad nas mkhris pa smang gi bar du smyon cing skyugs shig/ gal te skyugs sman btang ba las sman gyi mthu shugs zhan te/ babs cher mi smon tam sman 'ga' zhig slar brgal na bsnan pa'i dpyad ni/ bi pi ling dang / skyu ru ru dang /
19b2(gso rig): yungs kar rnams shol tsha dkar po 'am lce myang tshwa'i chu sbyor la/ yang yang slon cig sman gyis de ltar bsnun kyang skyon du mi rung na/ skyugs sman nyes pa yin te/ de'i nyan ni mchil ma mang g.yan par 'gyur thor bu ma pa rims kyis
19b3(gso rig): 'debs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro// skyugs sman btang legs na dang por bad kan 'byung / de'i rjes la mkhris par smon 'jug tu blung gi tshul dbu ba lnga bu 'byung ba ni/ skyugs sman legs pa yin no// de la ha cang skyugs sman drags
19b4(gso rig): pa 'am nad dkyil chen mang du smon pa'i rjes la dbu ba dang khrag tshon bag du byung na gas dka' ba yin no// de ltar sman drags te ma legs sam nad dkyil ches te nyams chung la slon drags na khong rgya lus tsha/ gre bi skam/ mig gis
19b5(gso rig): mthong ste mun par snang rlung nad+h+r-i yat+na ba ljang / khong nas sgrog ces bya ba'i khrag yod pa de skyon cing 'bying na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro// skyugs sman btang legs ni de'i rjes la ci ran cig ngal gso ste/ de nas nad dmigs dang sbyar la/ dud
19b6(gso rig): pa rnam gsum gang ying rung ba cig gis bdugs la de'i 'og tu sna mau bag btang ba yang gong ma dang 'dra bar bya'o// de nas kha zas bza' ba ni phyi 'phreng nus ka 'am/ yang na sman legs par ma zhu 'am/ rjes ma chad na phyi da na
20a1(gso rig): par tsam nu gdod kha zas yi gar bong zhing bkres na chu dron po ran pas khrus byas la kha zas kyi rim pa 'bras thug rkyang rgyang po la rim pa bzhin du bza' bar bya'o// bza' ba'i rim pa de yang dang po 'bras ba rdos
20a2(gso rig): pa'i thug pa rkyang rkyang po blung // de nas 'bras brngos pa'i thug pa byar langs tsam du byas la blung do// de'i rjes la thug pa kha gzar gyis bcu rung ba blad do// de'i rjes la sran tshod yu sha zhes bya ba bal po se'u 'bru dang sran bu dkar sbyar
20a3(gso rig): ba'i tshod ma dang 'bras bu can du lhags shing bza' de nas sran mu gau dang / bral po se'u 'bru dang spos sna tshogasu sbyar ba'i tshod ma dang 'bras can du lpags shing bza'/ mjug tu ni khu sha dang 'bras can du lpags shing bza'o// de ltar
20a4(gso rig): smon pa'i rjes la kha zas chos che chung bza' ba'i tshang ni skyugs sman lcags te/ legs par smon la dang ka sang snang por byas na thug pa dang / sran chod yu shA dang khu sha gsum char zos kyang rung ngo // 'bring tsam du blon na ni 'bras
20a5(gso rig): thug dang / sran tshod yu sha dang / rnam pa gnyis kA baT 'a // smon pa'i babs chungs te/ chen por ma slon na ni khu sha dong / kha zas sum 'bres dang sbyar zhing btsal lo// dper na me chung ste gso ba ni rtswa dang lci ba dang / rta drug dang /
20a6(gso rig): rtswa la sogs pas bags kyis gso zhing me khad kyis sbar na me che ba brtan pa dang / thang chos nus pa byed nus pa de dang 'dra ste/ skyugs spyan gyis nad bsal te/ dang ka sal sal por bya ba la/ thog mar kha zas drags na mi rung ste/
20b1(gso rig): 'bras thug sla mo la sogs pa rlan par sbyin zhing drod cher bya'o// de la skyugs sman gyi lan bzhi bzhi smon na phabs chung ba'i tshod do// lan drug slon na smon pa'i 'bring tshang ngo // lan brgyad du smyon na skyugs sman legs pa'i tshango //
20b2(gso rig): de las bkru sman gyis dkrus pa'i chung thong ni/ lan bcu khrus pa'o// 'brib tshad ni bcu gsum mo// ma thA ni lan bcu bdun no// de las 'khrus pa'i babs chung thad ni drug phul gang gi tshad do/ 'ibri nga ni ga phul der cha do// 'khrus bI che bani dug phus
20b3(gso rig): bzhir 'gyur ro// de la skyugs sman gyis smon te cho ga'i ched ni 'khrus pa'i byed tsam ste/ mjug tu mkhris pa byung na cho ga ci ran pa'i tshad do// de la bkru sman gyis bkru ste/ bkrus pa'i mjug tu bad kan byung na ran te mchog go/ dkru
20b4(gso rig): sman btang ba'i tshe drang po la thur du lan gnyis gsum tsam byung ba ni khong ba'i dri ma bshangs pa yin te/ 'khrus pa'i grangasu brtsi'o// skyugs smani btang ba ni skyugs sman 'thungs nas bkrus te smon pa dang / mjug tu mkhris
20b5(gso rig): po 'byung ba'i tshad kyis bzung ngo // skyugs sman gyis smon pa'i 'og tu snum bag btang ba dang / dugs bya ba yang zhag gsum 'am lnga 'am ba dun cho ga byas nas ngo'i rjes la gdong bkru sman btang ste/ de yang nang par bad kon gyi dus
20b6(gso rig): yol te/ lho sra snying tshong bzung la bi kru sman btang ngo // de la mi'i rang bzhin mkhris pa che zhing mang la lto sI ste 'o mas kyang 'khru bar 'gyur ro// mi'i rang bzhin rlung gi shas chen lto sr-i sta bkru sman dri bong dang ngan ti la sogs pas
21a1(gso rig): kyang bkru dka'o// de la mkhris pa che ba la sman bkru sman ro bska ba dang mngar ba las btang ngo // bad kan che ba la sman tsha ba las btang ngo // rlung chen snum pa dang drod che ba dang lan tshwa las btangango // sman btang yang 'khrur
21a2(gso rig): mi rung na chu bskol bskol ba dron mo blang ngo // lag pa'i thal mo me la bsros pa 'am/ gos mi la bsros bsros pas dugs bya'o// bkru sman btang ba las de nyin par chen po mi 'khru na thong de zan byinas kyi de nyin bkru sman thong zhig gal te
21a3(gso rig): nad pa zas yi ga ru mi 'ong ste/ kha zas mi tshud das lto sra ba zhig na snum btang ba'i cho ga zhag gsum 'am lnga 'am bdun du btong bar bshad pa de bas zhag grangs bskyed de zhag bcu'i bar du snum bag thong zhig/ de'i rjes la lus la dugs
21a4(gso rig): kyi cho ga byas nas de'i 'og tu gdong bkru sman btango // bkru sman bting ba de yang sngar lan cig 'khrus pa'i tshe/ bkrur ma btub pa de dmigs kyis nyes pa dang / ci las gyur pa legs par bltas te/ sngar cis nyes pa dran par byas la de
21a5(gso rig): las thabs ji ltar lags par bkru sman btang ngo // bkru sman btang ba las ma lags pa'i nad dmigs snyin lto ba nas zas mi 'ju ste/ gsung sgrags mnam por 'byung / kha zas yi gar mi 'ong bad kan mkhris pa gnyis rgyas pa
21a6(gso rig): blon par 'gyur/ g.yan pas 'debs che ba skye lus la thor bu 'byung cham pas 'debs thur bu 'byung cham pas 'debs thur du dbugs mi 'byung ba shang ba 'byung sra ba 'di lta bu 'byung bar gyur na bkru sman ma lags pa yi no// de las bkru
21b1(gso rig): sman legs pa'i tshul nam ma legs pa'i gnad bshad pa las bzlog par bya ste/ de la dang por ni khong pa'i dri ma bshang ba rje 'byung ngo // de'i rjes la mkhris pa de nas bad kan tha ma rlung 'byung zhing de ltar 'khru ba ni legs par balnga'o// de la bkru
21b2(gso rig): sman babs che ste ha cang dwags pa ni bad kan zad de med pa dang / mkhris pa yang zad de med chu skya bor 'khru khrag rtsa nag por 'ong yang na sha bkrus pa 'dra ba rtsa sngar bag can nam chu ser lta bur 'byung tshil lta bu'i nar nar po 'am/ rus bu lta bu
21b3(gso rig): 'byung gzhang phyir 'byung zhing ltog khe skom klad pa 'khor mig chags te phugs su bros pa 'di lta bur gyur na bkru sman ha cang drags pa'i tshul yino// bkru sman drags pa dang skyugs sman btang ba'i zas kyi cho ga dang 'dra bar bya'o// skyugs sman
21b4(gso rig): ltar btang ba'i cho ga las dud pas btang ba'i cho ga mi dgos so// bkru sman gyi rjes la kha zas bza' ba'i rim pa yang skyugs sman gyi cho ga bshad pa dang 'dra ste/ kha zos rims pas bza' zhing bags kyis kha zas nor ma yang phyi
21b5(gso rig): nas bza'o// gal te bkru sman btang ba las drong chung bas bkru sman ma zhu zhing nad ma phyin la long brnyas pa ni med nad dkyil ni che ba tsam ma yin na sman khong du ma zhi ba'i tshul de ltar gyur na 'di lta bu la dpyad du bgyi ba ni/ bkru sman 'thung
21b6(gso rig): ba'i nyin thog thag zas mi za bar mtshan yal nangasu nam bu zhu ba'i bar du bsdad cing kha zas mi za'o// yong ni sngar snum dang dugs kyi cho gar byas la phyis bkru sman btang ba nad cung la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// bkru sman btang ste bkrus pa dang
22a1(gso rig): gter ka btab pa dang / snum gyi cho gar sbyar te btang ba dang / zas mi za bar sbyang bar byas pa 'di rnams kyis ni drong chung zhing nyams par 'gyur ro// de bas na 'di lta bu la dpyad du bgyi ba ni 'bras thug rkyang rgyang po dang 'bras
22a2(gso rig): thug sla ba la sogs pa blud cing bags kyis btang ngo // bkru sman btang bas mkhris pa dang bad ka na bri ste chung ngu gyur pa dang / rlung dang mkhris pa che ba'i mi skom dang che ba de lta bu'i ma la ni thug pa blung du mi rung ste de dag la kha zas sod pa la
22a3(gso rig): sogs pa khad kyis brta bi'i cho ga bya'o// nad ma smin pa la ni skyugs sman btangango // nad smin pa la ni skyugs sman btang ngo // nad smin par gyur te bkru sman btang ba'i dus la bab na bkru sman btang ste nad bsal bar bya'o// skyugs sman
22a4(gso rig): btang ba ni bkru sman btang ba'i dus la bab ma bab pa/ nad sbyin pa la bsdang mi dgos par rung ngo // yang mi nyams chu zhing nad mang ba de lta bu la ni nod nyin smin cing bkru sman btang ba'i dus la bab na bkru sman btang mi dgos par 'khru
22a5(gso rig): bar 'gyur ba'i kha zas kyi cho ga byas na 'khru bar 'gyur ro// sngar bkru sman btang ste nyams chung ba dang nad kyang bri ste/ chung ngu gyur pa dang / mi sha chung ste skem pa dang / lho sra snyi tshong ma zin pa 'di lta bu la sman thun chung ba dang /
22a6(gso rig): sman 'jam po thong zhig de lta bas na ches sman lan mang du 'thubs po'i bla'o// dogs shing bag tsha bar gyur pa'i sman thun char ni btang du mi rung ngo // nad pa nyams chung ba lta bu la ni sman 'jam zhing thun chung bas nad zhi bar bya'o//
22b1(gso rig): nad pa nyams chung ba la da ltar nad pa nyams chung ba la de ltar dpyad bya ste/ nad mang po cung zad khad kyis brin de yang sman 'gas kyis btang zhing nang khad kyis khad kyis bas lo// nad dkyil bas phyin phyin pas nad pa yun ring du nyon mongs pa de lta bu
22b2(gso rig): drong chung lto sra bar gyur pa yin te de la dpyad du byA ba ni thal sman rnon pos gsha' ra dang / che tshe dang mar du sbyar ba btang na khong ba'i me drong skye ste/ zas 'ju rlung dang bad kan gyi nad kyang zhi nas de nas 'khru sman thong zhig/ nad pa'i nyams cha
22b3(gso rig): khong rtsub rlung gi shas che lto skra la rtag tu rtsol ba'i ngang tshul can/ khong pa'i drod che ba de lta bu ni bkru sman btang ba yang sman zhu bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de lta bu la ni sngar sman ma btang ba la nyams brtas nas phyis bkru sman 'jam po thong zhig gal
22b4(gso rig): te 'khrur mi rung ngam lan 'ga' zhig 'khrus nas sman rnon po cung zad dang sbyar ba'i sman re reng por mas bcug nas/ nad thur tu 'khrus te ma phyin pas khong yang 'jam la bkru sman legs pa bde bar 'gyuraro// gong du bkru sman btang
22b5(gso rig): nas sngar snum gyi cho ga bya bar bshad pa de yang dug gis babs pa'i ming dang mtshon gyis rmas pa lta bu dang thor bu byung ba dang / mdze nad dang / 'or nad dang / me dpral dang / mig ser dang / skya rbab kyi nad dang / za khu'i nad yod pa
22b6(gso rig): dang / 'di lta bu rnams la ni snum gyi cho ga ha cang char mi bya ba dang / bkru sman thong zhig de la snum bag gi cho ga bya ba dang / bkru sman btang ba dang / thams cad la nad med pa'i khong snum pa la snum gyi cho ga bya ste/ brtas la skyugs
23a1(gso rig): sman dang / bkru sman la sogs pa las bya zhing gang btang yang rung ste/ de dag gi bar dang / skabs skabasu snum gyi cho ga dang / dugs kyi cho ga bya'o// de ltar snum bag gi cho ga byas pa'i rjes la kha zas kyi nyams btsag/
23a2(gso rig): brtan nas bkru sman gyis nad bsal ba ni dper na gos dri ma can spangs la dkru ba dang 'dra'o// de la snum gyi cho ga dang dugs la sogs pa ma byas par rang ga bkru sman gtong ba de ni shing skam po dgug tu mi rung ba bzhin du lus ma rung
23a3(gso rig): ba'i nyen du 'gyur ro// de la cho ga tshul bzhin du byas pa'i bkru sman btang ba legs par bya ba ni sems gsal ba dang dbang po rnams dang / srog zungs rnams bstan pa dang khong du drod che me 'bar zas myur du 'ju rgas sra bar 'ong
23a4(gso rig): ste/ bak+Sha sman btang legs pa ni de lta bu yi no// skyugs sman dang bkru sman btang ba'i cho go'i le'u bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// / sman mas btang nyams brta bar bya ba'i cho gA'i le'u bcu dgu pa bshad bar bya'o//
23a5(gso rig): rlung nad kyi shas che ba de lta bu la ni sman mA btang zhing brta ste/ lus kyi khong snum par bya ba'i cho ga bzang ngo // de lta bas na sman dpyad kyi bya ba thams cad kyi nang na sman mas btang zhing khong snum zhing nyam brta bar bya ba 'di ni dpyad kyi
23a6(gso rig): mchog yin// de yang rnam pa gsum ste nad 'khrur rung ba khong du bsdu ba'i sman mos btang ba dang // lus kyi khang snum par bya ba'i cha ga bzang nga// da lta bas na sman dpyad kyi bya ba thams cad bkru sman drag po mas btang ba
23b1(gso rig): dang khong brta ba'i sman mas btang ba dang / rnam pa gsum mo// sman mas btang ba'i cho ga 'di gsum gyis sman dang lto lbos pa dang / rkang pa na te 'thengs pa dang / mcher pa na ba dang / rlung nad kyis lto 'khru ba dang / ljon pa dang / rims byung
23b2(gso rig): ba dang / cham pa na ba dang / rlung nad kyis khu chu 'gags pa dang / rlung nad las rtug skam du gyur te/ 'byung du mi rung ba dang / rlig rlugs dang / rde'u nad dang / khu chu la nad yod pa dang / rlung nad dkyel chen po gyur pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas bting
23b3(gso rig): ba rnam pa gsum gyis/ nad kun bsal bar bya'o// de la sman mas btang zhing bkrur mi rung ba'i nad dmigs ni snum bag btang ha cang drags pa dang / glo rdol ba dang lus ha cang skem che ste nyams chung ba lta bu dang / mchin pa na ste be'u snabs
23b4(gso rig): su 'khru ba dang / rtag tu smon bro ba dang / bkru smin gyis bkrus zin pa lta bu dang / sna nas sman btang zin pa dang / dbugs mi bde ste rngam pa drag tu 'byung ba dang / lud pa lu ba dang mchil ma mang ste rtag tu 'dor ba dang / gzhung 'brum khrig
23b5(gso rig): tshad kyis btab pa dang / skyigs bus btab pa lho lbos pa dang / drod chung ste zas 'jur mi rung ba lta bu dang / gzhang kha sbyangs te na bas sman mas btang du mi rung ba lta bu dang / kha zas zos zin pa lta bu dang / dmu rdzing gi nad kyis rtsi sgo kun
23b6(gso rig): 'gags pa dang / mdze nad dang za khu can du gyur te gcin sbrang rtsi'i mdog tu 'ong ba dang / bud med sbrum ma zla ba bdun las ma lon pa dang / 'di rnams lta bu la ni sman mas btang zhing byar mi rung ngo // de la sman mas btang zhing nyams
24a1(gso rig): brtas te khang snum par bya ba dang / sman las btang ba'i bkrur ru ba'i nad dmigs ni drod ha cang che ba dang / khong rtsub pa dang / rwa nad 'ba' zhig na ba las dmu rdzing du gyur pa lta bu dang / chas pas btab pa dang / ha cang sbom
24a2(gso rig): ches pa dang / lho na srin bu yod pa dang / rlung nad kyi shas ha cang ches pa dang / dbyig dug/ thungs pa dang / 'brum bus btab pa dang / rkang 'jam gyi nad dang / lba ba can dang / 'di rnams lta bu'i nad la sman mas btang zhing bkrur rung ngo // sman mas
24a3(gso rig): btang ba de dag gi cha dpyang sbu bu ni gser la sogs pa dang / shing dang rus pa dang / 'odi rnams kyi gce'u ma gas pa drang la 'jam pa kha zlum por byas te/ tshad ni byis pa na gzhon te lo gcig ma lon na srid sor lnga'o// lo bdun ma lon
24a4(gso rig): na srid sor drug go// lo bdun lon na srid sor bdun no// lo bcu gnyis lon na sor dgu'o// lo nyi shu lon pa phan chad la sor bcu gnyis// de yan chad lo grangs kyi bye brag dang / na tshod dang / 1mas stobs dang / lus bong las sbu gu'i
24a5(gso rig): tshang bskyed do// sbu gu'i tshad kyi sboms ni mthe bong shong ba'i ched du bya'o// rtse mo'i sboms ni mthe'u chung gi tshad du bya'o// byis pa chung ngu lo gcig lon pa yan chad sor mo ched las phyang phyed kyis de bskyed de zhabs kyi bu kA'i sgroms rab
24a6(gso rig): tratu che ba dang / sor mo gsum gyis rtse mo nang du shong ba tsam du bya'o// gce'u'i rtse mo'i bu ga'i tshad ni mon sran rje'u dang / sran chung dang / sran ma 'di rnams btsos pa shong ba dang / rgya shug gi 'bras bu shong ba'i tshad che chung gi rim pa de
24b1(gso rig): ltar bya'o// gce'u'i rtse mo'i gong du phog pa gdags pa'i chang ni gce'u'i bu ga sgom pa'i tshad dang / mnyam par bya'o// gce'u nas sman gtong ba'i tshe gce'u'i rtse mo'i kha bkal ba 'am/ pags pa bcad de ma bor bar byas nas btang
24b2(gso rig): ngo// gce'u zhabs sbom po'i kha nas yang sor gnyisu gzhal bar khog pa can de nas mar rim pa gnyisu brtags la/ bug pa gnyis kyi bar du sman blugs pa'i snod lug dang ra dang ma he la sogs pa'i lgang pa legs par mnyes pa
24b3(gso rig): tshon gyis dmar por bcos pa ska ba phur ma thag thug dang dring ba dang rtswa'i ri mo 'di rnam smra med rnying mjam la sA ba de lta bu'i gce'u dang sbyar te srang bus legs par bcings la sman blugs na bde bar bya'o// gal te lgang pa'i rgyal bu med na
24b4(gso rig): rgyal ba'i dpung ba 'am/ byin pa'i pags pa 'am/ ras skyugs po thigs bzang ba sgra tshil gyis byugs pa de lta bu li snod du bya'o// de la sman mas btang ste bkru ba'i tshad ni byis pa chung ngu lo gcig lon pa la srang gcig btang ngo // byis
24b5(gso rig): po chung ngu de lta bu las lo re re lon zhing sman srang re re bskyed de/ lo drug lon na srang bcu gnyis btang ngo // de yan chad kyang lo grongs las srang gnyis gnyisu bskyeng de lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang / lo bco brgyad lon pa nas lo bcu
24b6(gso rig): bdun lon pa man chad la spyir sman btang ba'i tshul ni thun rab tu che na yang srang nyi shu btang ngo // sman mas btang ste bkru ba'i thun srang ji snyed cig btang ba de las dpags te nyams brta zhing khong snum par byas pa'i sman mas btang ba bzhi
25a1(gso rig): cha gcig gi chad du bya'o// de lta bas na nyams brta ba'i sman mas btang du ra d+ya ba'i mi snum bag btang ba dang / dugs bya ba'i cho ga yang byas/ bkru sman btang ste/ nang gi nad kyang bsal 'bras thug sla mo dang glar po la
25a2(gso rig): sogs pas nyams bcag kyang brtas nas nyams brta ba'i sman btang du rung bar shes na thog ma nyid nyams brta ba'i sman mas btang bar bya'o// nyim brta ba'i yang dgun zla bzhi dang dpyid zla gnyis kyi tshe ni nyon par thong zhig/ kha
25a3(gso rig): cig na re zla ba 'di drug gi tshe mtshan mo yang btang du rung zhes zer ro// so ga dang dpya dang ston gyi tshe ni mtshan mo thong zhig/ de la khong snum zhing nyams brta ba'i sman mas btang bar bya na/ cho ga sngar bya ba la lus mar gyis bsku zhing
25a4(gso rig): lde gus dril la chu dron pos lus dag par bkru/ dro'i kha zas kyi tshad snga na ci zo ba'i thang las bzhi cha gsum ni bza' bzhi cha cig ni mi bza'/ kha zas ci za ba yang phan pa yod pa snam ches po yang ma yin/ rtsub chas pa yang
25a5(gso rig): ma yin pa de lta bu zos la khu ba la sogs pa skom gyi gor btung ba dang / tshal nan yang btung ngo // kha zas zos pa'i rjes la bcag pa byas nas bcang gci brtsal la mal bde bar 'dug na sngas smad nas ri smad bstod de/
25a6(gso rig): glo g.yon gyis phab nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum rkang pa g.yon ni rkyong zhig/ de nas gce'u yi nang nas sman mas btang ste gce'u kha dang gzhang kha yang snum gyis bsku'o// gce'u yi lgang pa nang du sman blugs la dbugs phyir
25b1(gso rig): phyud nas kha bcings la/ sman pa nad pa'i rgyab logasu 'dug nas/ rtabs bag tu sman myur du btang ba 'am/ dal zhing thogs pa ma yin par bya zhing gce'u'i nang nas sman nang du btang zhing btsir ba'i shags ha cang drags pa'am/ dal ba yang
25b2(gso rig): me yin/ ran par cig car lan cig tu btsir cing thong zhig/ lgang pa'i zhabs na rlung lus pa yod kyi sman gyi lhag ma ma lus par gyis shig/ sman btang zin nas brla dang rkub cos la thal mos brdab cing gan rkyal du bzhag la nad pa nyid rang
25b3(gso rig): gi lam la rkang pa'i rting pas brdung bar bya'o// sman pa 'am/ nad g.yog gis nad pa'i rkang pa nas gtog ste lan gsum du bsigs shig/ de nas nad pa sdus bcug nas brkyang ste/ nyal la rkang pa'i rting par nad g.yog gis khu tshur
25b4(gso rig): gyis brdung ba 'am/ brla dang byin pa la yang khu tshur brdung zhing lus snum gyis bskus la mnye bar bya'o// lus la brdung zhing mnyes la mi bde bar byas pa ngas/ sman slar myur du phyir mi dbyung ngo // gral te sman slar myur du phyir byung bas
25b5(gso rig): phan mi byed par gyur na/ sman mar phyi ma gzhan yang sbyar la btang ngo // khong pa'i drod che bas sman mas btang ba zhu na nub kar kha zas kyang bza'o// zas zos nas de phan chad ma tshan thog thag tu ci yang mi bza' mi btang bar nyil cig/
25b6(gso rig): gal te sman phyir 'byung du mi rung ni sman sbyar ba'i star bu 'am/ sman rnon ba lgang ba nas mas btang zhing khong na smin mar lus pa phyir dbyung ngo // gal te khang pa'i nang na ha cang rtsub ches pas sman ma zhu ste phyir ma byung ba dang / khong pa'i
26a1(gso rig): drod chungs pas sman ma zhu ste/ phyir ma byung la nang du gyur pa med na bsdad par bya zhing mtshan mo de bzhin du 'dug par bya'o// nad par li dong ra dang / 'u su bskol ba'i chu'am yang na chu 'ba' zhig gdus pa btung bar bya'o// nyam
26a2(gso rig): brta ba'i sman mas btang ni nyi ma gsum 'am/ nyi mo lnga lon na yang thong zhig/ gal te 'ju bi'i drod ches pas sman zhu ba'am/ yang na rlung gi gas gcang ches pa dang / rtag tu rtsol zhing bcag pa byed pa dang / mi'i drod ha cang che ba dang /
26a3(gso rig): khong pa'i nang rtsub pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman mas btang ba'i nyi ma re ra btang du rung ngo // de ltar khong snum zhing nyams brta ba'i sman mas btang ba lan gsum lan bzhi btang nas lus kyi khong da'i rtswa 'jam zhing snum par nad dbyung
26a4(gso rig): zhing bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ bkru ba'i sman mas btang zhing sbyar bar bya'o// snga na lus kyis khong rtsub pa las snum par bya ba'i 'og tu nyi ma lnga lon na chos grangs bzang po'i nyi ma cung zang phyed yol tsam na sman pas gtor ma
26a5(gso rig): bkra shis kyi tshig byas la nad pa lus til mar gyis byugs dugaspu byas bshad+ba ga ci'i dri ma bsal la/ ha cang bkres pau tsam ma yin par 'dug la nad kyis dmigs dang sman la sogs po la mkhas pa'i mi dang / gang de la mkhas
26a6(gso rig): pa mang po dang / lhan cig tu 'gro zhing sman mas btang ba'i bkru sman drag po sman gyi khu ba spangs pa chu srang brgyad bcu'i bzhi cha gcig ste srang nyi shu dang / po son cha'i 'bras bu 'brum bu brgyad dang sbyar te btso zhing de'i nang du mar ni sman
26b1(gso rig): gyi khu ba srang nyi shu'i bzhi cha cig nang du blugs te bcom 'di ni rlung nud la btang nA/ sa de ltar sbyar ro// mkhris pa na ba la btang ba dang / na ba med pa nyam tha mal pA la btang na sman gyi khu ba srang nyi shu rtsa drug cha cig gi thad du blugs te/ btso bar
26b2(gso rig): bya'o// bad kan gyi nad tsha ba la btang ni smin gyi khu ba srung nyi shu'i brgyad cha gcig gi thang du mar blugs te/ btso bar bya'o// yang na nad thams cad la sman gyi khu ba'i brgyad cha gcig gi thang du mar blugs te bco'o// bkru ba'i sman mas btang
26b3(gso rig): ba btso ba de yang ha cang mi bska mi sla bar sbyar zhing btso'o// de'i nang du bu ram srang gcig tsa ma~M dang sbrang rtsi dang / lce tsho la sogs pa nad dmigs dang sbyar zhing ci rigs par spags te/ sman lhag mi sbyar te/ sman de thams cad snod cig tu
26b4(gso rig): blugs la/ bum pa chu chen bskol ba'i rlangs pa'i khar bsro zhing / sman dkrug dkrug la sman gtong ba'i gce'u rgyal ba'i nang du blugs te/ ha cang mi tsha mi grang ha cung mi snum mi rtsub ha cang mi rno mi 'jam/ ha cang mi gar mi sla
26b5(gso rig): ha cang mi nyung mi mang tsa tsha med pa 'am tsha bar yang mi bya/ de dang 'dra bar 'bras tsam kyang / mi mang mi nyung bar sbyar te/ sman mos btang zhes mkhas pa kha cig ni de skad ze'o// yang sman pa kha cig na re mar dang sbrang rtsi gnyis
26b6(gso rig): kyi tshad so sor srang gsum gsum dang na ba med cing nyi ma tha mal pa zhig la btang na lce che zho gnyis po son 'cha' dang shu ti la sogs pa srang gnyis spangs pa'i khu ba dang sman lhag mi'i khu ba srang banur sbyar te sman khu sbangs spangs
27a1(gso rig): pa mar dang btsos la sbrang rtsi dang lce cher sbyar te/ rim pa 'di ltar byas sman btang ba'i rgyal bur blugs la/ bkru ba'i sman mas btang ba'i cho ga de ltar bya'o// de la rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas btang zhing bkru bar sbyar na shing nye rong
27a2(gso rig): dang lha tsha sen da ba dang nyi'u shing pa dang a shwa gan+da dang / oM raN+Da'i lo ma sman dang zhing 'jam pa dang skyur ba dang dro bo'i khu ba dang ldan pa 'di lta bu'i sman rnams ni rlung nad sel ba'i sman mas btang bar bzang ngo // mkhris pa'i nad sol ba'i sman mas
27a3(gso rig): btang zhing bkru ba'i rnam grangs la gtogs pa la shing n+ya gro d+ha dang / shing u dus+tha ra dang / shing klag sha dang / shak+kha dang / shing mngar dang / 'o ma dang / nye'u shing dang / 'bri mar dang / ro dang ra zhing bsil ba rnams dang / bu ram shing gi khu ba
27a4(gso rig): sbrang rtsi dang 'di rnams ni mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sman mas btang zhing bkru bar bzang ngo // bad kan rgyas pa'i nad sal ba ni dong ka dang / dug mo yungs dang pa tA lig dang / ches khrigs dang / shing nim+ba dang / sle tres dang / pa Ta dang / ka tu
27a5(gso rig): kha ro ha ni dang / shing gi khu ba she le ya kha dang / pu ti kaR+Sha dang / rak+Sha ka rany+dza dang / sap+ta paR+Sha zhes bya ba tshigs re la lo ma bdun yod pa dang / sbrad rtsi dang ba gA cin dang / sman ro tsha zhing rno ba dang drod che ba rnams dang tsha ba rnams sbyar tre bcos la
27a6(gso rig): sman mas btang zhing bkrus na/ bad kan gyi nad sel to// de la rlung nad dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gsum char gyi nad 'dus par gyur na yang / de gsum gyi sman gong du bshad pa las nad so so'i sman ci ran du shas shas kyis bsdus
27b1(gso rig): bapa btsos pa'i thun spyir mi che ba ran par mas btang ba'i bkru sman drag po btang ngo // brtas bkru ba'i spyan mas btang nas sngas kyis brtan te gan rgyal du sems gud du mi g.yengs par sman btang ba de la yid bzhag par bya'o// de nas thur du bkru zhing
27b2(gso rig): 'ong bar gyur na langs te tsog pur 'dug la bshang bar gyis shig/ gal te 'khyim na skad cig thogs te bol du ma rung na sman 'di nyan tsha ste 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu nyan du gyur pa la slar btsos shing dpyad du bya ba la mar dang nas tshig 'khus
27b3(gso rig): pa'i thal sman rnon po dang / ba gcin dang 'bras kyi rtsabs kyi khu ba sgyur mo dang sbyor la btsos pa 'jam zhing rno la dro bar sbyar te/ sman mas btang ba'i rkyal bu gzhan du blugs te bshams la mas btang zhing tshir tsog/ yang na po son cha las
27b4(gso rig): sbyar ba'i sman gyis gdab mu las gzhug pa bya zhing sdang ba yang bya'o// yang na 'di ltar ma gyur te sman mas btang yang 'ong bar gyur na sman phyi ma sbyar te/ rkyal bur blugs la lan gsum lan bzhi'i bar du yang sman drag po mas btang zhing legs
27b5(gso rig): por btang nas de'i rjes la kha zas kyi cho ga ni bkru sman btang ba'i cho ga dang 'dra bar shes par byas la kha zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol du chu dron pos khrus byas nas bza' ba'i thabs ni 'bras thug rkyang rgyang po dang / 'bras thug sla mo btung sha khyA sla
27b6(gso rig): mo dang 'bras chan du sbyar te bza'/ sman drag po mas btang ste bkrus pas khong pa'i dri ma nad kun phyin na/ khong pa nang 'phyang bag tu 'dug pa dang / nyams chung ta khong rmya ba de lta bur gyur pa de la chu dron po bde bas khrus byas nas kha zas cho ga bzhin
28a1(gso rig): du zos na lus zhig cing rmya ba la phan te/ zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te sman de ltar mas btang ste/ bkrus pa las rlung nad kyi bar du khong dbo bas grang bar 'gyur te/ mi bden yang de'i mod la 'phral du rlung zhi bar 'gyur ba'i sman
28a2(gso rig): btsos te mas btang zhing khong 'jam zhing snum par 'gyur bar bya'o// sman mes btang ste bkrus pa legs pa'i tshul dang / ha cang drags pa dang thun chungs ta ma 'khrus par gyur pa 'di rnams kyi tshul ni sngar snum gyi cho ga bya zhing btang ba legs
28a3(gso rig): ma legs bshad pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o// sman mas bting ste bkrus pa'i rjes rlung nad du gyur pa la khong 'jam zhing snum par 'gyur ba'i sman mas btang ba cung zad tsam zhig bsdad na khong pa'i dri ma bshing ba dang bcas te sman mar dang cig
28a4(gso rig): car 'gyuraro// thur du dbug pa yang sman mar dong lhan cig 'ong bar gyur na/ khong snum zhing 'jam par 'gyur ba'i sman mas btang ba legs pa yin// yang bad kan gyi bag chen de la khong brta ba'i sman mas btang ba lan gcig gam lan
28a5(gso rig): gsum gyi bar du thong zhig mkhris pa rgyas pa'i shas che na/ brta po'i sman mas btang ba lan lnga 'am lan bdun gyis shig/ rlung nad la brta ba'i sman mas btang ba lan dgu 'am bcu gcig tu thong zhig/ de ltar brta ba'i sman mas btang ba'i
28a6(gso rig): lan grangs zung du ma gyur par byas nas gal te de'i rjes la bkru ba'i sman mas gtong bar 'dod na yang thong zhig/ de ltar sman mas btang ba'i rjes la bad kan dang mkhris pa dang / rlung nad sel ba'i kha zas mon sran rde'u'i tshod ma khu
28b1(gso rig): ba can dang 'o mA dang khu sha 'di gsum thos na nad kyi rim pa bzhin du pan no// de la rlung nad sel ba'i sman drag po mas btang zhing khong snum la brtas par bya na shing nya rong dang lce tsha sne brda dang sbyar te snum dang / mngar dang 'bras rtsabs sgyur ba
