28b2(gso rig): dang / sha khu khrod che bas bag sbyar te bskol la rgyu lta bur blugs te btang ba 'di ni rlung nid gcig pu lnga phan no// mkhris pa'i nadA la nI n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sman sde'i grangasu gtogs pa dang / shug pa dang / kha ra dang / mngar bag dang bsil
28b3(gso rig): bge dang ma r+ya dang 'o ma dang ma shing gi khu bo 'di rnamasde sbyar te/ gdugs la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ sman mas btang na mkhris po'i nad 'byung zhing me'i khong ba rtol snum par 'gyur ro// ba kun gyi nad la dong ka la sogs pa dang / dugu mo
28b4(gso rig): lungs la sogs pa dang / sman rtsub pa rnams dang / ba gcin dang sman rno ba dang / rdod che ba dang / ro che ba dang / 'di rnams bskol ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar te/ mas btang na bAd kan gyi nang 'byung ngo // de la rlung nad la ni lan gcig btang ngo //
28b5(gso rig): mkhris pa'i nad la lan gnyis bi tingo // bad kan gyi nad la lan gsum btang bar bya'o// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa gsum 'dus pa'i nad la yang sman dpyad de gsum rim pas btang nr-i 'dus pa'i nad pa byang bar 'gyuraro// sman dpyad kyi
28b6(gso rig): slob dpon spyod pa can na re/ yong ma'i nad bzhi ni rlung dang bad kan dang / mkhris pa gsum du zad de nad 'di gsum bsal ba'i dpyad bkru ba'i mas btang ba las gud na dpyad rnam pa bzhi zhes bya ba med de/ de'i phyir smin mas btang bar
29a1(gso rig): bya'o// rlung dang bad kan dang mkhris pa'i nad/ khong nas bskyod cing sdud pa dang / nad bkru ste byang bar bya ba dang / nad zhi bar byas te/ 'di lta bu yang rim gyis bya ba yin te/ de'i phyir nad rnam ba gsum bkru ba'i dpyad mas
29a2(gso rig): btang zhing bkru bar bya'o zhes ze'o// de ltar sman mas btang ba yang nad dmigs dang sman la sogs pa'i mthu dang / nad pa'i nyams stobs dang / de thams cad kyi tshod zin par byas la sman btang ngo // bkru ba'i sman btang ba legs pa'i tshul
29a3(gso rig): mthong / ma dpags kyi bar du bkru ba'i sman btang ba'i rdzas bcad du mi rung ngo // yang khong snum zhing 'jam pa brta ba'i sman mas btang ba dang / bkru ba'i sman mas btang ba ga yang rung ste/ lan gcig btang yang mi rung lan mang du btang ba
29a4(gso rig): yang mi rung ngo // de la khong brta zhing snum pa'i sman mas gtong ba ni nad khong nas bskyod cing ba sdu ba dang / khong pa'i drod ni chung bar 'gyur ro// bkru ba'i sman btang ba la 'jig pa'i rten ni rlung nad ldang bar 'gyur ro// sman mas btang ba'i rim pa ni
29a5(gso rig): sngar lus kyi khong 'jam zhing snum par bya ba'i sman de btang ngo // de'i rjes la bkru ba'i sman mas btang ngo // de'i rjes la kho nga ba'i brda pa'i sman mas btang bar bya'o// sman mas btang ba'i dpyad byas pa ni rlung nad dang / bad kan mkhris pa'i
29a6(gso rig): nad gsum char sel te khong snum zhing brta bar bya ba'i sman mas btang ba dang / bkru ba'i sman mas btang ba'i cho ga rig par bya ba ni da lta bu yi no// yang sman mar thun chung ngu'i thang du tshod bzung ste/ btung ba dang khong 'jam zhing brta
29b1(gso rig): ba'i sman mas btang ba thun chu ngu'i thang du tshod bzung ste rtag tu btang bar bya'o// de la sman mar thun chu ngu'i thang du btung na/ nad pa'i drod dang nyams las kyang dpag te srang gcig tsam btungo // brta ba'i sman mas btang ba ni srang gnyis tsam thong zhig/
29b2(gso rig): de la sman mar thun chu ngur btang ba'i mi ni byis pa dang rgan po dang / lam rings kyis dub pa'i mi dang / khur gyis dbu pa dang / bud med bsten drags pa lta bu dang / drag shul byas pa lta bu dang / sems las che ba dang / rlung nad kyis lus
29b3(gso rig): zhom pa dang / ring ba dang / drod chung ba dang / rgyal po dang phyug po lta bu bde zhing longs spyod pa dang / 'di rnams lta bu la sman thun chu ngu btang dgos te/ thun chu ngu 'thungs na nod kun sal/ kha zas kyi cho ga la sogs pa bsrung zhing sbrang
29b4(gso rig): ba med pa la sha skye/ bshang gci dri ma sI ste bde blag tu 'ong ste bde bar 'gyur ro// bud med rnams kyi nad mo mtshan na ba dang / mngal gyi gnas na ba dang / sman mas btang ba'i rim pa ni dang por khong 'jam zhing snum par gyur pa'i
29b5(gso rig): sman mas je btang ba/ de'i 'og tu bkru ba'i sman mas btang ba lan gnyis sam gsum thong zhig/ mjug tu ni nyam patsag brta ba'i spyan mas btang bar bya'o// nga la skyes pa chu so na rje'u yod pa lta bu dang chu 'gags pa lta bu la po mtshan
29b6(gso rig): nas sman mas btang nas gce'i srid chad ni nad pa nyid kyi sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad du gsar dngul la sogs pa las brdungs pa'i zlum po ba mjug lta bu zhabs dang bar gonyis ka'i rna ba brtags la rtse mo'i bu ga ni yungs kar btsos
30a1(gso rig): ba shong ba tsam du gtong la/ 'jam par byas te/ gce'u yi rtse mo me tog/ kun+da 'am/ sre shing gi me tog lta bu rtse mor byin gyis phra zhing sla bar bya zhing / sman btang ba'i snod rgyal bu ni 'jam zhing lang bar bya'o// chad ni pho rum gang
30a2(gso rig): shong ba tsam las che chung gang rigs par bya'o// de ltar sman mas gtong ba byed na sngar khrus la kha zas 'ju sla zhing yang ba ran par zos nas khong snum zhing 'dzam pa'i sman cho ga bzhin du pho mtshan nas thong zhig/ de ltar sman btang ba'i thabs
30a3(gso rig): ni khri'u yi phang pus mo tsam la drang po bde bar 'dug nas pho mtshan brtags la drang por byas nas pho mtshan gyi sbu gu nang btsal ste/ sman btang bde bur bya ba'i phyir/ pho mtshan bu ga nas srubs kyi thad ka'i nang thog thag rlig pa'i mgo tsam du
30a4(gso rig): thur ma 'jam po phre'u btang la de'i 'og tu brgyal bu'i gce'u lag pa mi 'dar bas sman mos gtong ba bzhin du thong zhig/ de ltar sman btang nas de'i rjes 'da' ba'i sman mas btang ba yang / rim pa bzhin du bya'o// de yang na lan gsum
30a5(gso rig): yang na ldan bzhi'i bar du 'jam zhing snum pa'i sman thong shig/ 'jam zhing snum pa'i sman btang ba'i cho ga rgyas par ni sngar thams cad bshad pa bzhin du bya'o// bud med rnams zla mtshan dbyung ba'i tshe mngal gyi kha phye ba bu chags par 'gyur
30a6(gso rig): te/ de'i tshe snum zhing brta bar bya bar 'gyur ba'i sman thong zhig/ na na ni zla mtshan 'byung ba'i dus la ma bab par sman btang dgos so// mo mtshan gyi nang gi mo mtshan nyams pa dang pho mtshan ne ba dang / mo mtshan ma rungs par 'gyur ba dang /
30b1(gso rig): khrag 'byung ba 'di lta bu la sman mas btang na ban te/ gtsaT srud na sor bcu'o// rtse ma'i 'u ga ni sran ma bcos pa shong bar bya'o// sman gyi gce'u na bu grwa 'chags pa'i mngal gyi mngal du sar bzhi btang ngo // chus 'gags te na na gcig gis lam
30b2(gso rig): du sor gnyis btang ngo // bu mo chung ngu dang byis pa rnams la ni sor gcig go// thun 'brin ni srang gcig go/ bu mo rnams lo ni pho rum gang gi tshad zho gnyis so// sman btang ba'i thabs ni mal du gnas te 'dug la rkang pa dang brla bskum la/ pus mo
30b3(gso rig): gyen du bstod la nyin zhag cig la mal lan gsuM 'am lan bzhir snum zhing sha btsag brtas par gyur pa'i sman btang ste/ de ltar zhag gsum du thong zhig/ sman mas btang ba de yang bags kyis thun chung ngu nas bskyed cing btang ngo // sman bting nas zhag
30b4(gso rig): gsum ngal bsos la de nas zhag gsum du sman thong zhig/ sman de ltar gtong na sngar skyugs sman btang nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang / bkru sman gyis bkrus la yang zla ba phyed lon pa dang / bkru ba'i smon mas btang ngo // dper na ras kyi tshon lag
30b5(gso rig): rgan can chu'i nang nga bkrus na dmar po phyin cing med pa bzhin no// de dang 'dra bar snum pa'i sman mas btang bas ni lus kyi khong snum gyis brlan cing bangs par gyur pa dang / nad thams cad phyin par 'gyur te/ lus kyi yan lag dang / khong pa'i
30b6(gso rig): nang grol dang gnad dang / mgo bo man chad lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad kyi nad dang / rlung dang bad kan dang / mkhris pa'i nang du gyur pa'i nad gzhi sel ba'i sman dpyad 'di las long zhig/ gzhan cung zad kyang med do// bad kan dang /
31a1(gso rig): mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad khong du song shing dkyil skyes pa dang bshad gci dri ma khong du bsags te skyes pa de lta bu sel cing 'byin pa'i nad rgyal bu nas mas btang ba med na man dpyad de las gzhan medado// de bas na sman rkyal
31a2(gso rig): bu nas mas gtong ba'i tshig gcig pu'i nang du dpyad thams cad 'dus// sman dpyad gzhan ni sman mas gtong ba'i ched tsam du zad do// gzhan yang nad snying dang / nad gsar pa dang gtar ka gdab cing khrag dbyung ba la yang sman rkyal bu nas mas btang
31a3(gso rig): na phan par 'gyur ro// sman mas btang ste/ nyam brta bar bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa rdzogs so// / sman sna nas btang ba'i cho ga le'u nyi shu ba bshad par bya'o// thor ka yan chad klad pa'i nad la sman sna nas btang
31a4(gso rig): na lhag par phan no// sna ni klad pa'i sgo zhes bya ste/ de bsau na klad pa'i nad thams cad la sna nas btang ste/ bkrus shing gsal ni nad phyin par 'gyur ro// de la nad dmigs ni klad pa na ba dang / lus klong bag tu gyur pa dang / kha dang sna nas
31a5(gso rig): bad kan mang du 'byung ba dang / lkog ma na ba dang kha gdong dang klad pa skrangs pa dang / thor bu byung ba dang / lus la srin bu yod pa dang / rtsa mdud byer ba dang / mdze dang smyo bag dang / cham pa na ba dang / 'di rnams la sman sna nas btang na phan par
31a6(gso rig): 'gyur ro// mgul ba yan chad klad pa rlung nad kyis bag la mi bde ba la sman mar dang sna nas btang na pan te brta bar 'gyu ro// nang par nyi ma shar nas nyi ma phyed kyi bar du klad pa gzhogs phyed na ba dang / skad 'gags pa dang kha sna bskams pa
31b1(gso rig): dang / skad mi phyin pa dang / mi gsal te go dka' ba dang / dpung pa ltung ba snyam du byed cing bskyod ma nus pa dang / 'di rnams ltar mi bde ba la sman sna nas btang na phan te zhi bar 'gyur ro// mig gi 'bras bu sngon por 'gyur ba dang / dpung ba bam/
31b2(gso rig): bebam por gyur te tshor ba med cing bskyod mi nus pa dang / skra'i nad dang / mig dmar por gyur pa 'od rnams la dpyad du bya ba mgul pa yan chad rlung nad du gyur te na ba la btsod dang shing mngar dang / pra pun ta ri ka stag tsher ba dang / dzi ba ka ri sha pa
31b3(gso rig): ka dang / ram nye ba dang / gu tshang rdo dang / sha rA ba dang / puN+ye r+Na ba dang / skyer khaN+Da dang / byi thang ka dang / sle tres dang / ka ka na sa dang / sgron shing dang / 'di rnams cha mnyam par byas te/ zhib tu btags la til mar srang brgyad la btso nA ni sman 'di
31b4(gso rig): rnams srang gnyis gnyis kyi thang du bya/ til mar spang bcu drug las bco na sman srang bzhi bzhi'i thad du sbyar ro// sman btso ba'i chu ni til mar las bcu 'gyur du bskyed do// 'o mas til mar dang thang mnyam par byas la chu dang 'o ma du ba'i bar du
31b5(gso rig): btsos te tshos pa'i tshad ni tshigs ma dril tu btub cing dbu bo cher byung na tshos pa'i tshad yin te/ de nas sman mar btsags te/ btsir la snod bzang por ldugs shig spyan 'di'i ming ni btsod la sogs pa las sbyar ba'i til mar zhes bya'o//
31b6(gso rig): gal te mgul ba yan chad mkhris pa rgyas pa'i nad du gyur na btsod la sogs pa sman 'di rnams snga ma dang 'dra ba 'bri mar ram ba mar las snga ma bzhin du btsos pa'i tshad til ma ra dang mi 'dra bar dril du btub na chos pa yin no//
32a1(gso rig): de nas btsags te btsir la sman mar snod bzang por bzhag la mkhris pa'i nad la sna nas btang ngo // de la mgul pa yan chad bad kan du gyur te na ba'i sman sna nas btang ba sbyar ba ni sman sbyor ba la phal ni snga ma dang 'dra ste/ btsod
32a2(gso rig): la sogs pa de rnams kyi steng du sbrang rtsi dang ba gcin dang / rgya ma tshwa dang / chang rnams kyis bsnun te/ snga ma dang 'dra ba ra ti la kar nang du brkos la bad kan gyi nad la sna nas thong zhig/ de ltar sman 'di rnams kyi rlung nad dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad
32a3(gso rig): la so sor btang zhing kha sna nas bad kan la sogs pa drang zhing bkru bar bya'o// sna nas btang ba'i rjes la mgul pa yan Nang brtas shing bde ba' bya ba'i dpyad sna nas btang ba 'u su dang sha kha dang sha btsos pa'i khu ba dang 'o ma dang chu dang mar 'di rnams
32a4(gso rig): sbyar te snga ma brjin bcos la/ tshos pa dang btsags pa'i sman mar sna g.yas g.yon gyi bu ga nas btang ste sna nas btang ngo // cho ga tshad ni mar gyi nang du mdzub mo'i rtse mo nas 'dzub mo'i tshigasu dbu ma man chad nub par bcug pa la sman mar ji
32a5(gso rig): tsam chags pa'i rgun de tsam re re sna g.yas g.yon nas btang zhing bkru'o// yang klad pa na ba la li dong ra dang / na le sham dang / rgyam tshwa dang / bi pi ling dang / 'di rnams la sogs pa brdungs te chu dang 'o ma dang til mar gyi nang mnyes te/ btsag
32a6(gso rig): cing btsir ba'i khu ba sna nas bting ngo // yang klad pa na ba la li dong ra dang / pi pi ling la sogs pa tsha ba ro rno ba rnams zhib tu btags te/ sbu gu sor drug pa gnyis gtod pa'i nang du sman phyi ma blugs la/ sna g.yas g.yon gyi bu ga gnyis
32b1(gso rig): ga'i nang du kha'i dbugs kyis bus na bad kan la sogs pa'i klad pa'i nad rnams 'byin cing byang bar 'gyuraro// de ltar sman phye ma zhib tu btags pa sna nas bus te btang bas ni klad pa'i nang phal cher sel cing 'byang bar 'gyur ro// spyis sman mar lnga bu
32b2(gso rig): sna nas btang ba'i tshang ni mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis man chad mar gyi nang du nub par bsnyags te phyir phyung ba la mar thigs pa ba nu 'am brgyad dam drug chags pa dang / 'di rnams gsum ni thun che thang zhes bya ste/ de la sman mar zhig sno nas gtong na chan
32b3(gso rig): thigs pa bcu 'bring na thigs pa brgyad/ chung na thigs pa drug go/ yang sman mar ma yin pa sman gyi khu ba btsir te sna nas btang ba cha thang gi rim pa ni thigs pa bcu las gnyis phri ste brgyad btang ngo // thun 'bring thigs pa brgyad las
32b4(gso rig): gnyis phri te drug btang / thun chung ngu thigs pa drug pa gtong Tha la thigs pa gnyis phri ste thigs pa bzhi btang ste/ thun cha thang gi bye brag rim pa ni 'di ltar sbyor cig/ yang de la sman sna nas btang du mi rung ba'i dmigs ni chu 'thungs
32b5(gso rig): pa dang / chang 'thungs pa dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / mar 'thungs pa'i rnams dang / 'phral du 'thungs par 'dod pa dang / kha zas zos pa dang mgo bkru ba dang / khrus byed 'dod pa dang / gtar ka gdab pa dang / cham pa sar pa dang / bshang gci
32b6(gso rig): 'ong bar 'gyur te/ mi bde ba dang / bud mad bu ba tsas ma thag pa lta bu dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / lud pas bskar ba dang / skyugs sman dang / bkru sman gyis bkrus pa dang / rkyal bu nas sman mas btang ba rnams dang / dus ma yin par
33a1(gso rig): char 'bab pa lta bu'i tshe dang yul ngan 'byung ba dang / dus 'di lta bu'i tshe sman sna nas btang du mi rung ngo // gal te na ba'i dmigs kyi tshul gyis sman sna nas mi btang du rung bar gyur na ni nyen 'di rnams bsrung mi dgos te/
33a2(gso rig): sman sna nas btang ba'i cho ga gyis shig de la mgul pa yan chad kyi nad kyi bad kan gyi tshul du na na bad kan dus ni nang par yin te/ nang par thong zhig mkhris pa na na dus nyi phyed yin te phyed na thong shig/ rlung nad kyi bag tu na na phyi 'phrad dang srod la btang
33a3(gso rig): bar bya'o// na ba med cing nyams tha mal pa zhig la sman sna nas btang na ston dang dpyid kyi tshe ni snga dro nas btang ngo // dgun ni nyi ma gung gi tshe na thong zhig/ so ga na ni phye 'phred kyi tshe na thong zhig/ dbyar gyi tshen nyi ma dron po'i tshe na thong zhig/ klad pa rlung
33a4(gso rig): nad kyis thebs te cher na na sgyid bus btab pa dang / mgo 'dam pa dang / gnyi'u rings kyis btab pa dang / skad 'gags pa dang / 'di rnams lta bu'i nad la nang par nyi ma shar skab kyi 'og tsam dang / nub ka dang dus gnyisu zhag bdun bar du nyin
33a5(gso rig): gcig bzhin mthong shig/ nad 'di rnams lngar na ba med pa la sna nas gtong na ni nyin gcig btang la nyin cig bar bcad mi btang ngo // de la sman sna nas btang ba'i cho ga'i thabs ni sngar bshang gci'i dri ma bsal la mgo bo mar gyis bsku
33a6(gso rig): dugs ran pa tsam du byas la mal rlung med par dron por 'dug nas/ mgul pa yan chad dugs ran pa tsam byas la/ de nas lus gan rkyal drang por brkyang la rkang lag brkyang rkang pa cung zad tsam bstod la/ mgo bo'i sngas cung zad cig smad
33b1(gso rig): sna'i bu ga ya gcig nas sman mar btang ste/ de yang sngar btang ba'i sman mar de/ snar gtong ba'i sbu gu can gyi nang du blugs te chu dron pa'i nang du bsros la btang ngo // snar blugs pa ni snod mchu can du bstod pa'am/ yang na ras mas blangs te snar gtigs
33b2(gso rig): shig/ snar blugs zin nas rkang mthil dang 'phrag pa dang lag pa dang rna ba la sogs pa mnyes shig/ sman snar btang ba de mtshul pa nas sna'i nang du brngubs la mchil ma glo g.yas g.yon du bor cig/ de bzhin du sman snod mchu can gyi nang na
33b3(gso rig): yod pa de zad zad kyi bar du sna g.yas g.yon du ras kyis lan gsum du mthong zhig/ gal te sman rnos drags pas brgyal bar gyur na gdong pa dang brang du chus gtor cig/ mgo bor ni chus ma 'dabs shig/ de ltar sman sna nas btang ste bkrus
33b4(gso rig): pa'i rjes la nad kyi tshul dang yang sbyar te/ rlung nad du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ sman mar snum bag du 'gyur ba sna nas thong zhig/ snar snum btang nas grangs brgya'i bar du gan rgyal du 'dug par bya'o// de nas de'i rjes la sbu gu'i dud pa kha gsum
33b5(gso rig): kha snar btang zhing khong du brngubs nas bri ba ma tshul pa bde zhing dag pa song sang por bya ba'i phyir/ chu dron pos mkhur ba bkang la bsdad cing dpo'o// de ltar sna nas btang ba legs par gyur na dbugs bde gnyid legs par 'ong sems gsal la
33b6(gso rig): rno bar 'ong ngo // gal te sman sna nas btang ma lags na mig rtsub skya bo ha ra har por snang kha sna skam klad pa'i nang stong par gyur pa snyam byed gal te snum btang ha cang drags na g.yan par 'gyur/ mgo dang lus lci snrubs dang mchil ma mang
34a1(gso rig): yi ge 'chu cham pas 'debs pa nyan 'di lta bu 'byung ngo // sman sna nas btang zhing bkru legs na mig gsal zhing rno la yang khi'i nang dag sto sang bgau can du 'gyur skad gsal bar 'gyur ro// sman sna nas btang zhing bkru
34a2(gso rig): ma legs na mgul pa yan chad dang klad pa'i nad sbyar bas dkyil skye bar 'gyur ro// bkru ba'i sman sna nas btang drags te/ ha cang cher 'khrugs par gyur na khong rmya bar 'gyur ro// de la gal te nad pa glo rdol ba dang nyams chungs te/ khang
34a3(gso rig): rmya ba dang byis pa chung ngu dang / mi rgan po dang / skyid cing longs pa'i mo 'di rnams lta bu la ni gong du sna nas sman pas thang chung ngur bshad pa de ltar thong shig/ nad dmigs dang sbyar nas sman sna nas btang dgos par gyur na dbyar sman sna nas
34a4(gso rig): tsating ba'i dus ma yin par yang rung ste/ sman sno nas btang bar bya'o// yang cham pa drag pos btab pa dang / de bzhin du cheng 'thungs pa dang / rna ba mi gsang ba dang / klang rgyas kyi nang du srin bu zhugs pa dang / nang khrol nas bsdus
34a5(gso rig): spyir ma phyin par gyur pa dang / 'di rnams lta bu la ni sman snar btang ba thun che ba'i thang du btang du mi rung ngo // snar sman btang ba'i chung thang ni yang na ba med cing nyam thal bar 'dug pas sman mari nyung shas rtag tu snar btangango // da'i
34a6(gso rig): thabs ni nyin par zas zos pa'i rjes dang / smon pa'i rjes dang / nyin par gnyid log pa'i rjes la dang / lam rings 'dron du song bas dub pa dang / bud med la drags pa dang / mgo bo mar gyis byugs pa dang / chu dron pos
34b1(gso rig): mkhur ba gang nang bor ba'i rjes dang / bshang gaN+DI'i dri ma bsal ba'i rjes dang / sa shing gis bkrus pa dang / gang mo rgod pa'i rjes dang 'di rnams lta bu mar thigs pa re re sna'i nang du bskus na 'di rnams lta bu kun la phan par 'gyuraro//
34b2(gso rig): de ltar sna nas btang ba 'di ni chung thang zhes bya'o// sman mar sna nas lan lnga btang na rna ba dang mig la sogs pa'i nang gi bug kun la phan par 'gyur ro// sman mar sna nas lan gsum btang na ngal zhing dub pa rnams med de brtas par
34b3(gso rig): 'gyur ro// de'i rjes la yang snar lan lnga btong na mig rno zhing gsal ba'i mthu skye'o// de'i 'og tu sman mar sna nas btang na so brtan la stod kyi rlung nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// byis pa lo bdun ma lon pa la sman sna nas btang du mi rung ngo // lo
34b4(gso rig): brgyud bcu 'das pa'i rgan po li yang sman sna nas btang du mi rung ngo // lo bco brgyad du ma tshang ba la dud pa kha sna nas btang du mi rung ngo // byis pa lo bco lnga ma lon pA la chu dron pos mkhur ba bkang zhing 'dor ba yang mi rung ngo // gzhon
34b5(gso rig): kho bcu lon pa la bkru sman dang skyugs sman la sogs pa btang du mi rung ngo // lo bdun bcu 'das pa'i rgyan po lA yang bkru smin dang skyugs sman la sogs pa btang du mi rung dro// sman skur btang ba thang chung ngu gong du dmigs kyi
34b6(gso rig): bstan pa bzhin snar bsku steyang thun che chung rnam pa bzhir shes par bya'o// de la thun chung ngu'i tshe thang ni thigs pa gnyis snar snang ngo // thun chung ngu'i 'bring thang ni thigs pa re re bas kyang chung be tsam zhig sna g.yas
35a1(gso rig): g.yon gyi nang du bskus na klad pa lta bu dad dmigs ci yod pa snga ma langs pa ldang bar mi byed pa yin no// thun chung ngu bar ni sna'i nang du nang dmigs bskus te snrubs mtshul pa nas snar brngubs la phyir bor ba'i nang na mar
35a2(gso rig): mngon du snang bar byed pa ni thun chu ngung thang zhes bya'o// de ltar thun chungu'i rnams las gang ran pa tsam nang 'tsho ba'i bar du tshe gcig la rtag par bsku zhing btang na snum rngub par bya ba'i sman mas btang ba dang 'dra/ sna nas btang ba'i thun che chung
35a3(gso rig): bstan pa dang 'dra sti stod kyi nad tsI la yang phan zhing bde ba'i yon tan du 'gyur ro// sna nas btang ba'i sman chung ngu rtag tu btang ba la/ cho ga bsrung zhing spang ba yang med/ nyin du gyur pa'i nad kyis 'jigs pa yang med do// de la sman mar zhes bya
35a4(gso rig): ba ni/ dmigs kyis til mar nyid la byA s+t+waM ti la mar rtag tu btang na dzin ti dge'o// yid mgo bo ni bad kin gyi gnas yin pas nan pa med cing nyams tha mal pa lta bul sman mor thong zhig/ de la sna nas btang ba'i spyan mar sbyar ba ni dzaM ban+ti dang /
35a5(gso rig): dza la dang / sgron shing dang / glu sgang chen po dang / shing tsha dang / bu shal tse dang / go yi dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / skyer ba'i rtsa ba dang / shing mngar dang / gla ba dang / a ka ru dang / nye'u shing dang / puN+Da dang / bil+la dang / ut+pa la dang /
35a6(gso rig): d+ha bar+t+ti dang / u ra b+hi dang / thi ra dang / byi tang ga zhes bya ba srin bu gsod pa dang / gan+d+ha ba tra dang / sug smel dang d+ha ri nu ga dang / pad+ma'i ze ba ge sar dang / ba la dang / sman 'di rnams sna tshang bar ci rnyed du sbyar te cha bsnyams la tol mar tsi tsam
35b1(gso rig): btso ba de las chu ni char pa'i chu brgya 'gyur du bskyed pa'i nang du sman brdungs la btsos te chu'i khu ba srang dgu bcu ni du phyi na srang bcu tsam zhig lus pa dang / btsags pa sman gyi khu ba phyi na brgya'i bcu cha gcig lus pa de la til ma
35b2(gso rig): dang sman gyi khu ba bcu cha gcig dang sbyar te bcos la tshos pa dang / btsigs la til mar gyis nang du sman gyi khu ba phyi mas kyang bsnun la btso'o// 'di bzhin du lan gnyis len gsum nas lan dgu'i bar du bsnan cing btsags la mjug
35b3(gso rig): ga ma sman gyi khu ba bcu cha dang til mar ci tsam yod pa'i ra'i 'o ma de tsam bang bgams te la tsos la chochos po'i rtags dbu ba byung ba dang btsags par bya'o// sman mar 'di'i ming ni til gyi 'bru mar thigs phran zhes bya'o// sman mar
35b4(gso rig): 'di rtag tu sna nas btang ba'i phan yon ni lus brtan zhing drang / pags pa'i sha mdog bzang zhing gsal/ phrag pa dang / mjing ba dang / dpung mgo dang 'di rnams brtan zhing mkhregs la ma zhum par mtho bar 'gyur/ bzhin dang kha'i
35b5(gso rig): nang gsal bar 'gyur/ dbang po rnams gsal zhing brtan skra dkar med par 'gyur ro// sman snga nas btang ba'i cho ga ste le'u nyi shu pa rdzogs so// // sman gyi dud pa btang ba'i cho ga ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gcig pa bshad par
35b6(gso rig): bya'o// mgul ba yan chad kyi nad ni klad pa na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / kha sna nas bad kan dang mchil ma mang ba dang / mgo bo lci ba dang / klad pa gzhogs phyed na ba dang / cham pas btab pa dang lud pa lu ba dang dbu gos mi bde ba dang /
36a1(gso rig): kha zas tso zos kyang ro bro bar mi tshor ba dang / kha nas bad kan dang mchil ma ha cang mang du 'ong ba dang / skad mdzor cing 'gags pa dang / sna nas rnag pa zag pa dang / kha nas rnag 'ong ba dang / skyigs bus btab nas mgul
36a2(gso rig): pa na ba dang so na ba dang / nyams chung zhing rid pa dang / zas yi gar mi 'ong ba dang / 'gram pa na ba dang / gnye'u rengs su gyur pa dang / so dang skra dang / klad pa'i nang du srin bu zhugs pa dang / mgul pa yan chad dang / mgo bo g.ya' ba dang /
36a3(gso rig): skya bab du gyur pa dang / skra la gza' zhugs pa dang 'bri ba dang / sbrid pa 'byung du mi btub pa'am/ sbrid pa ha cangs sam mgo yong khyer ba dang / gnyid che ba dang / 'di rnams la sogs pa'i nad kun ni gzhi rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i nad
36a4(gso rig): mo zhu bar gyur te/ mi bde ba yin no// de lta bu'i nad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ dud pa rnam gsum rngub cing btung ngo // rnam gsum ji ltar btang zhe na mgul pa yan chad rlung nad du gyur na sman 'jam zhong snum pa'i dud pa btang ngo // rlung nod dang pad
36a5(gso rig): kan du 'dres pa'i nad la sman gyi dud pa mi 'jam mi rno ba ran+da par btang ngo // bed kan gyi nad la ni rman rnon po'i dud pa btang ngo // de la mkhris pa rgyas pa dang / khrag rgyas pa'i nad la bkru sman btang ste/ bkrus pa dang / dmu rdzing dang /
36a6(gso rig): za khu la sogs pa 'di rnams la ni sman gyi dud pa btang du mi rung ngo // mig rab rib khyer ba dang mgul pa yan chad klad pa'i bar du rlung zhugs pa'i nad dang sman mas btang bar gyur pa dang / lto spros pa dang nya zos pa dang / chang 'thungs pa dang /
36b1(gso rig): zho dang bu ram dang 'o ma dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar 'thungs pa dang / dug 'thungs pa dang / mgo bo yan chad snad pa dang skya bab kyi nad dang mtshan mo gnyid ma log pa 'di rnams lta bu la sman gyi dud pa btang du mi rung // gal te 'di rnam ltar mi bde ba la
36b2(gso rig): sman gyi rung ba btang na nyin du gyur pa'i nad khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad dang / mig long rna ba 'on skom da che ba ba rgyal ba dang rmongs shing myos par byed do// gal te dus ma yin par dud pa btang ngam/ dud pa ha cang tshar btang drags na de la nad dbyung
36b3(gso rig): du bya ba'i tshig ni sman bsil bas 'phral ba dang mgo bsku/ bsil ba'i kha zas kyi cho ga byas na phan no// de la sman gyi dud pa btang ba'i dus dang dmigs ni bkres pa dang glal byung ba dang / gshang gci dri ma bsil ba dang / bud med la brtan pa
36b4(gso rig): dang / gtar ka gdab pa dang / gad mo dgod pa dang / so shing gis so drud pa 'di rnams lta bu byas pa'i 'og tu dud pa mi drag pa 'jam po chung ngu zhig thong zhig/ yang bkras pa dang glal byung ba la sogs pa'i dus 'di lta bu'i tshe mtshan mo kha
36b5(gso rig): zas zos pa dang / sman mA sna btang ba'i rjes la yang dud pa 'bring tsam sna nas btang ngo // yang gnyid log pa dang sman mas btang ba dang / mig sman gyis bskus pa dang / lus khrus byas pa dang / skyugs sman btang ba 'di rnams lta bu'i
36b6(gso rig): rjes la dud pa snar btang ste bkru ba'i cho ga bya'o// dud pa kha snar btang ba'i dpyang ni mas btang ba rgyal bu gser dngul la sogs pa las brdungs pa dang 'dra bar byas te/ de yang gce'u kha gsum pa dang drang ba zhabs kyi drung ni sboms mthe
37a1(gso rig): bong shong ba tsam rtse mo'i sboms ni rgya shug gi tshig gu shong tsam du bya'o// gtse'u srod ni sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa dang / sor sum cu rtsa bzhi pa dang / sa ra bzhi bcu pa dang / de ltar che chung rnam gsum du bya'o// de
37a2(gso rig): bad kan gyi nad la dud pa'i sman rnon po btang nA/ gce'u sor nyi shu ngu bzhi pa btang ngo // rlung nad la sman gyi dud pa 'jam zhing snum pa btang na gce'u sor gsum cu rtsa gnyis pa las btang ngo // rlung dang bad kon 'dres
37a3(gso rig): pa'i nad la sman gyi dud pa rno 'jam ran pa gce'u sor bzhi bcu pa la su btangango // snar dud pa btang ba'i thabs ni drang po tsog por 'dug la sems gud du mi g.yeng bar dud pa btab pa la bsams te kha gdangs la khar dud pa la ni gsum btang ngo //
37a4(gso rig): de nas sna'i bu ga ya gcig bkag la bu ga ya gcig nas dud pa btang zhing rngub po// sna'i mtshul pa'i nad dang klad pa'i nad dmigs la dud pa kha nas btang bas nad bskyod cing bsdus par gyur pa de la sna nas dad pa rngubs na nad daM phyin

38a1(gso rig): sman spo yo dri zhim po'i nang na ro rno ba'i grangasu gtogs pa rnams dang / 'di rnams kyi drung pa sna nas btang zhing mgo bo'i nad bkru bar bya'o// sman gyi dud pa btang ba sbyar ba'i thabs ni sman rnams zhag gcig mu'i nang du
38a2(gso rig): spangs te chu dgas su zhi ba rab tu btags la shing bu grangs zhing 'jam po srang mo sor bcu gnyis pa la dud pa'i sman lde gu btag btag pa lan lnga'i bar du byugs shing drib ma la bskams la sman gyi gter bu sbom mtheb mo tsam thog drung phra

38b4(gso rig): sman mar sbyor ba ni mngar dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang / sman drod che ba rnams brdungs la btags te/ chu dang sbyar ba'i khu ba 'am 'o ma yang rung sha khu yang rung ste 'di rnams dang sman gyi khu ba dang til mar ram 'bri mar dang sbyar te/
